1b1(mdo sde): //rgyu gar skad du/AR+tha kA shA lAm+b+ha la pa ri d+hA ranA ma ma hAmAn s+yAt+ma/'od
1b2(mdo sde): skad du/'phags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//
1b3(mdo sde): bam+ba po dang po//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
1b4(mdo sde): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od mi'i
2a1(mdo sde): tshal byA ka lan+ta ka gnas pa na 'di lta ste/bsam gtan pa rnams kyi gnas/gnas med pa rnams
2a2(mdo sde): kyi gnas/stong po nyid lnga gnas pa rnams kyi gnas/mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa dang /smyon pa med pa la gnas
2a3(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi gnas na 'di lta ste/dge slong 'bum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/
2a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyang sgra sbyangs pa/dben pa la gnas pa/nang du yang dag 'jog la mngon par brtson pa sha stag go/de'i
2a5(mdo sde): tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin
2b1(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/tshe dang ldan pa mau d+gal gyi bu chen po dang /tshe
2b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa kAt+yA'i bu chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che chen po dang /tshe dang ldan pa ka pi ne dang /tshwa dang ldan pa skul byed chen
2b3(mdo sde): po dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /tshe dang ldan pa don yod rgyal po dang /tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa dga'o bo dang //
2b4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang /tshe dang ldan pa ci 'jigs dang /tshe dang ldan pa nye spos dang /tshe dang ldan
2b5(mdo sde): pa mis byin gyi bu dang /tshe dang ldan pa thang la gnas pa dang /tshe drang ldan pa mo ki le dang /tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang /de dag dang gzhan
2b6(mdo sde): yang dbong dang ldan par gyur pa lnga brgya tham pa phyi ma red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dge 'jog las langs nas/bcom ldan
3a1(mdo sde): 'dus gal ba der dong smye lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'byas la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig
3a2(mdo sde): tu 'khod do//yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa grogs sbyin dang /tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang /tshe dong ldan pa la so mchod dang //
3a3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa grags 'dod dang /tshe dang ldan pa dga' sde dang /tshe dang ldan pa dga' 'dod dang /de dag dang gzhan yang dge slong
3a4(mdo sde): lnga brgya them pa lem du zhugs pa las dbyar mnyan yod na gnas nas/rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshul bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa ga lwa ba
3a5(mdo sde): dang/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgro bos phyog btsal te phyogs gcig tu
3a6(mdo sde): 'khod do//yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa de dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i stong dang lha ni
3b1(mdo sde): cig tu yul tsam par dbyar gnas nas lam du zhugs te/rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal byA ka lAn+ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /bcom ldan 'das gal
3b2(mdo sde): bub der dong ste lkugs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'
3b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang /dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang /ded dpon bzang po dang /phug sbas dang /mis byin dang /dbang pos byin
3b4(mdo sde): dang /chu lha dang /tshangs lho dang /stobs bzang dang /bla ma'i blo gros dang /khyad par blo gros dang /'phel ba'i blo gros dang /mthong ba don yod dang //
3b5(mdo sde): legs par yang dgra zhugs dang /rab kyi rnal gyis rnam par gnon dang /rtog tu brtson dang /brtson pa mi gtong dang /nyi ma'i snying po dang /'gro
3b6(mdo sde): ba 'dzin dang /sa 'dzin dang /bdud rtsi 'dzin dang /blo gros mtha' yas dang /brtan pa'i blo gros dang /'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon dang //
3b7(mdo sde): mtha' yas rnam par gnon dang /dpag med rnam par gnon dang /rdo rje'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang /don yod pa'i gom pas rnam par
4a1(mdo sde): gnon dang /mi g.yo ba'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang /spobs pa chen po dang /spobs pa rnon po dang /spobs pa zab pa dang /
4a2(mdo sde): spobs pa mtha' yus dang /spobs pa dpag med dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /pad+ma dpal gyi snying po dang /chos 'phags dang /lag
4a3(mdo sde): na rin chen dang /rin chen 'dzin dang /bskal pa 'gyur ba mtha' yas par go cha bgos pa dang /bud med 'gyur ba'i go cha bgos pa drang skyes pa 'gyur
4a4(mdo sde): ba'i go cha bgros pa dang /sems can 'gyur ba'i go cha bgos pa dang /mtha' yas khyu mchog dang /dpag mid khyu mchog dang /dmigs pa thams cad
4a5(mdo sde): rnam par 'jig pa'i khyu mchog dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang tha mi dad par spyod pa'i go che bgos pa sha stag
4a6(mdo sde): ste/yul tha dad pa rnams su dbyar gnos par gnas nas yul rgyu zhing gcig tu 'dus te/rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshul bye kra lan+ta ka gA nas pA ga laM bya
4a7(mdo sde): dang /bcom ldan 'das ga lo ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas bcom
4b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'dus par thugs su chud nas rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas rgyal po'i
4b2(mdo sde): kheb kyi grong khyor chen po 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa na/dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad
4b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'odas la blta ba dang phyag 'tshal ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'odra ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka ga nus pa gral ba dang /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/
4b4(mdo sde): lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag bcil te phyogs gcig tu 'khod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad
4b5(mdo sde): du//de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po lus 'phagasau ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na dge slong lnga brgya tham pa thams cad kyang dgon pa pa/bsod snyoms pa/phyag dar
4b6(mdo sde): khrod pa/chos gos gsum pa/cog pu pa/rtswa'i gadring ba pa/shing drung pa/'dod pa chung ba/chog shes pa/rab tu dben pa pa/chos gos dran pa chung bo sha stag
4b7(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dge slong lnga brgya
5a1(mdo sde): thum pa de dag dang lhan cig tu lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug nas mi snang bar gyur te/rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+d+ha ka gnas pa
5a2(mdo sde): na 'dug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad de/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po rgyang ring po nyid nas 'ong ba gzigs
5a3(mdo sde): te gzigs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag gnas brtan 'odi srungs chen po 'ong ba 'di ni dgon pa pa/bsod snyoms
5a4(mdo sde): pa/phyag dar khrod pa/chose gos gsum pa/chos gos dran pa 'tshang ba/bas mtha'i gnas malA la gnas paM/'dod pa chung ba/chog shes pa/rab tu dben
5a5(mdo sde): par gnas pa/mu 'dres pa/chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa ste/dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos ji snyed pa ni dge slong dag da ltar dge slong 'od srungs
5a6(mdo sde): chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dag dang mtshungs pa 'am 'dra ba ni ngas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //dge slong dgra dge slong 'od srungs chos gos gsum pa ni lha
5a7(mdo sde): rnams dang yang smra ba dang kun du smra bar mi 'dod na mi rnams dang lta smos kyang ci dgos/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po rgyang ring po
5b1(mdo sde): nyid nas 'ong ba gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/'od srungs tshur shog 'od srungs khyod legs par 'ongs so//kye ma gnas brtan 'od srungs kyis ni 'di lta ste/'drir 'ong
5b2(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i phyir yun ring po nas rnam grangs byas so//'od srungs khyod gdun 'di'i phyed la 'dug cig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srungs la gdan gyi phyed
5b3(mdo sde): gnang ma thag tu de nas bcom ldan 'das gdon de las bskyod pa dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'gul/rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab tu 'gul//
5b4(mdo sde): g.yos rab tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos/ldeg rab tu ldeg/kun tu rab tu lhag cing 'jig rten du snang ba chen po'ang byung bar gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
5b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'di ni 'di lta ste/dper na yul me ga d+hA'i kha ra ba'i snod la lcags kyi thu lum gyis bsnuni ne 'ur 'ur zer ba de bzhin du btsun pa 'od srungs chen po la gdan gyi
5b6(mdo sde): phyed gnang ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdon las bskyod nas/de nas de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
5b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sgra skad chen po 'byin to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po chos gos phrag po gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
6a1(mdo sde): bcugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la bla de logs su thul mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phyin to/bcom ldan 'das kyi
6a2(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos btugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags la bdag ni nyan thos legs pas
6a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gos sam/lhung bzad dam/gdan nam/de las gzhan
6a4(mdo sde): pa'i longs spyod rnams nyan thos rnams kyis longs spyad par rngo mi thog lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de dag ni lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du
6a5(mdo sde): bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa lags shing /bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das las sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod pa gang dag blangs pa de dag
6a6(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das mchod rten du gyur pa lags pa'i slad du ste/de dag bdag gis ma sbed lags so//bcom ldan 'das de slan chad 'dod pa'i rnam par
6a7(mdo sde): rtog pa'i rnam par brtags pa'am/gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par brtags pa'am/'dod chags kyi
6b1(mdo sde): yongs su gdungs pas gdungs par gyur pa 'am/zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung ba dang /gti mug gi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs par gyur pa ma dran lagrus
6b2(mdo sde): so//bcom ldan 'das mdor na slob par gyur pa bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las sha n+da'i ras phyag drar khrod mnos pa rnams mi slob pa'i sa la thug gi bar du spyi
6b3(mdo sde): bos mnos lags so//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis longs smad pa'i slad du blangs pa ni ma la gos kyi gdams pa dang /rjes su bstan pa las brtsams nas blangs
6b4(mdo sde): lcags so//bcom ldan 'das de dgra blangs nas sems mtho ba'am dma' bar gyur par mi dran lags so//bcom ldan 'das sha ni'i ras phyag dar khrod de dag chos
6b5(mdo sde): gos ma mchis pa'i lus la sbyar bar mi dran lags so//bcom ldan 'das phyag drar khrod de dag sreg pa ma red pas reg par mI dran lags so//bcom ldan 'das gang
6b6(mdo sde): dang gang du mchi ba de dang der sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod de dag mgos 'tshal cing mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod de dag yan lag mi gtsang
6b7(mdo sde): ba gang gis kyang reg par mi dran lags so//bcom ldan 'das sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod mchod rten du gyur pa de dag bcangs lags so//bcom ldan 'das de dag
7a1(mdo sde): ni bcom ldan 'das kyis spangs shing gnang ba lags te/de dag ni bdag gis bcangs lags so//sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ma lags
7a2(mdo sde): par de lngas gzhan snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis bdag gzhan du gnas par mi dran lags so//bdag ji ltar gnas pa nus la sa'i 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang //
7a3(mdo sde): chutshul chu'i 'du shes dang /mel me'i 'du shes dang /rlung la rlung gi 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang /'jig rten 'dri'i 'du shes dang /'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du
7a4(mdo sde): shes su ma gyur pa dang /bcom ldan 'das gang mthong ba dang /thos pa dang /bye brag phyed pa dang /rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rjes su brtags pa dang //
7a5(mdo sde): rjes su bsams pa de la'ang bdag 'du shes su ma gyur pa dang /bcom ldan 'das gang 'du shes med pa'i gnas pa dang /'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
7a6(mdo sde): pa'i gnas pa dang /gang 'du shes las yang dag par 'da' ba'i gnas pa dang /gang 'du shes med pa las yang dag par 'da' ba'i gnas pa dang /gang 'du
7a7(mdo sde): shes kyi gnas pa dang /gang 'du shes med pa'i gnas pa dang /gang 'du shes thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba'i gnas pa de'ang slob pa'i gnas pa
7b1(mdo sde): dang /mi slob pa'i gnas par bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so//bcom ldan 'das gnas pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rjes su ma
7b2(mdo sde): mthong /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lpags te/bdag ni de ltar gnas lags
7b3(mdo sde): so//bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na nam mkha' bla gab ma mchis pa la ming dang brda dang gdags pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pa dag/bcom ldan 'das ming dang
7b4(mdo sde): brda dang gdags pa gang dag gis nam mkha' zhes tha snyad du btags pa dang /nam mkha' zhes brdar brtags pa dang /nam mkha' zhes rten du bgyis pa dang
7b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' zhe 'am/bla gab ma mchis pa zhe 'am/stong pa zhe'am/gsog ce'am/gaslob ce'am/ya ma brla zhe'am/gzung ba ma mchis pa
7b6(mdo sde): zhe 'am/tshad ma mchis pa zhe 'am/rten pa ma mchis pa zhe 'am/blang ba ma mchis pa zhe 'am/dor ba ma mchis pa zhe 'am/lus ma mchis pa zhe'am/ji lta ba bzhin
7b7(mdo sde): zhe 'am/yongs su dag pa zhe'am/bar snang zhe'am/thogs pa ma mchis pa zhe 'am/dngos po ma mchis pa zhe'am/bstan du ma mchis pa zhes de dag dang /gzhan
8a1(mdo sde): yang tha snyad kyi brda tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brjod pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/tshad 'di tsam mam/yongs su bcad pa 'di tsam
8a2(mdo sde): mAm/mnyam pa 'am/mi mnyam pa zhes ming ngam/brda 'am/rten rnams kyis 'tshal bar mi nus lpags so//bcom ldan 'das gang dgra de'i phyogs tsam
8a3(mdo sde): zhig 'tshal ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang kha dog gamA/dbyibs sam dmigs pas nam mkha' de tshad 'di tsam dang /mchog 'di tsam zhes bgyi ba mi 'tshal
8a4(mdo sde): lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang de bzhin go shegs pa zhes bgyi ba 'am/sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba 'am/ston pa zhe 'am/skyabs she 'am/dpung
8a5(mdo sde): gnyen zhe 'am/gnas she 'am/'dren pa zhi 'am/rnam par 'dren pa zhe'am/yongs su 'dren pa zhe'am/sman pa zhe'am/gso ba zhe 'am/lam ston pa zhi
8a6(mdo sde): 'am/lam brjod pa zhe 'am/gzhan yang tha snyad tha dad pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs brjod pa'i tha snyad kyi tshig gang dag gis mkhas pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
8a7(mdo sde): bstod pa dang /bkur ba dang /bsngags pa dang /rab tu bstod pa dang /rib tu bsngags pa dang /bcom ldan 'das tha snyad kyi tshig gang dag gis 'jig rten
8b1(mdo sde): mngon par brjod pa'i chos de dag ni bcom ldan 'das bdag ma 'tshal mi rten ma mthong lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis//
8b2(mdo sde): yu mya brla dang /ngo bo nyid kyis gsob lags pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na sgyu ma mkhan gyis rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/dpung
8b3(mdo sde): gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang ldan pa/rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba zhig sprul par gyur la/bcom ldan 'das de'i thad du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig
8b4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnam par rgyal bar bgyi ba la gnas pa/mtha' yas pa de dag thams cad lhags shing bcom ldan 'das de la lus tha dad
8b5(mdo sde): par yang gda' la/bcom ldan 'das de la sems can lus tha dad par yang mthong lugs mod kyi/bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i 'khor los sgyur
8b6(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag gis ni dpung gi tshogs 'di'i bdag po bya zhing /gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rjes su 'jug par bya'o snyam du mi sems lags la/
8b7(mdo sde): dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po de'ang 'di snyam du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'di ni bdag cag gi gtso bo yin pas bdag cag ni 'di'i rjes su 'jug par bya'o snyam du
9a1(mdo sde): mi sems lags mod kyi/de dag de'i rjes su 'jug par bgyid par yang gda' lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos de dag gi chos
9a2(mdo sde): nyid gang lags pa de la/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'am/nyan thos su ma/slob pa 'am/mi slob pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas sam/so so'i
9a3(mdo sde): skye bo ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das chos nyid de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid dmigs pa'am/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid mngon
9a4(mdo sde): po'am/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid brten pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid dmigs pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid mngon pa 'am/rang
9a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid brten pa'am/nyan thos kyi chos nyid dmigs pa 'am/nyan thos kyi chos nyid mngon pa 'am/nyan thos kyi chos nyid brten pa 'am/so
9a6(mdo sde): so'i skye bo'i chos nyid dmigs pa'am/so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid mngon pa 'am/so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid brten pa'am/gzugs kyi chos nyid dmigs pa'am/
9a7(mdo sde): gzugs kyi chos nyid mngon pa 'am/gzugs kyi chos nyid brten pa'am/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i chos
9b1(mdo sde): nyid dmigs pa'am/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid mngon pa'am/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid brten par mi 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das chos nyid de la
9b2(mdo sde): gzugs stong pa dang /'dris gzugs stong pa dang /'di la gzugs stong pa dmigs pa dang /de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par
9b3(mdo sde): shes pa stong pa dang /'dis rnam par shes pa stong pa dang /'di la rnam par shes pa stong pa dmigs pa dang /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa dang /'dis
9b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa dang /'di la de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa dmigs pa dang /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dmigs pa dang /'dis
9b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dang /'dri la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dmigs par mi 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de
9b6(mdo sde): la nyan thos ma mchis/nyan thos kyi chos nyid ma mchis/so so'i skye bo ma mchis/so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid kyi bar du ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das dper
9b7(mdo sde): bgyi na/sgyu ma mkhan gyis 'khor los sgyur ba 'am dpung gi tshogaso sprul pa de la 'khor loso sgyur ba ma mchis/dpung gi tshogs ma mchis lags so//sgyu ma la ma
10a1(mdo sde): mchis/sgyu ma'i chos nyid la ma mchis/sgyu ma mkhan rnams la ma mchis lags so//sa la ma mchis/chu la ma mchis/mI la ma mchis//
10a2(mdo sde): rlung la ma mchis/nam mkha' la ma mchis/rnam par shes pa la ma mchis lags so//sa dang /chu dang /me dang /rlung dang /nam mkha'i khams rnams
10a3(mdo sde): la ma mchis/rnam par shes pa'i khams la ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni de dang 'dra lags te/bcom ldan 'das de dag la
10a4(mdo sde): bdag ni rlom sems su mi bgyid/de dag la bdag ni byung bar ma gyur/de dag bdag gis ni ma smras lags so//bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag ni yon tan gyi chos
10a5(mdo sde): rnams nyid las dben pa lags pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams rjes su dran par bgyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das de ni lam lags/de ni tshul
10a6(mdo sde): legs te/lam de la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo lam de rjes su thob pa rnams ni 'di snyam du gzhan yang dag par blangs la 'jug par bya zhing //
10a7(mdo sde): ston pa'ang gzhan btsal bar bya la/dge sbyong ngam/bram ze gzhan smra ba'i gdong du gyen du blta bar bya zhing /tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni shes bzhin pas shes//
10b1(mdo sde): mthong bzhin pas mthong /yang dag pa'i lta ba'ang 'dogs bzhin pas 'dogs par byed do snyam du mi sems lags te/de ni gnas ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan
10b2(mdo sde): 'das gnas pa 'di la ni bdag som nyi ma mchis pa thob pas gnas lags so//chos kyi sgo de'ang rjes su thob pas gnas lags so//chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste
10b3(mdo sde): dben pa'i tshul dang /skye ba ma mchis pa'i tshul dag gis tshul gcig pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
10b4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas la chos kyi the tshom zhu bar 'chil ba lags la/de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag la skabs phye ba lags te/dbang po'i brag phug nas 'od ma'i tshel
10b5(mdo sde): 'drir phyin pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das bdag 'dir mchis pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan gyi phyed gnang ste/bdag la gnang ba na stong gsum gyi stong chen
10b6(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu 'ur 'ur zhing rnam pa drug tu yang g.yos/rab tu g.yos lags so//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa ni
10b7(mdo sde): bdag nyid chen po'i chos dang ldan pa de lta bu dang /rgya chen po'i chos dang ldan pa de lta bu dang /slob dpon ma mchis shing rang byung ba lags kyang thugs rje chen po'i tshul
11a1(mdo sde): la bzhugs shing /lhag pa'i dra rgyal ma mchis pa dang /nga rgyal ma mchis pa la bzhugs nas bdag la gdun gyi phyed gnang ba ngo mtshar lags
11a2(mdo sde): so snyam bgyid de/bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi ni mi dbul po 'tsho ba ngan po tshegs kyis 'tsho ba zhig tshigs kyis khyim gyi phun sum tshogs pa bsgrubs nas//
11a3(mdo sde): rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bro nas dbang bskur ba dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i gan du blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /dri bar
11a4(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i slad du mchis par gyur la/mchis pa de la des stan gyi phyed stsal na/de nas de 'di snyam du sems lags te/rgyal po la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba'i
11a5(mdo sde): phyir bdag song du zin kyang bdag gis blta ba dang /phyag bya ba'ang dka' bar 'gyur na gsol ba lta ci smos/rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i bdag
11a6(mdo sde): phyin ma thag pa la stan gyi phyed byin du zin kyang 'di ni ngo mtshor ro snyam bgyid lags so//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
11a7(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas ni rang byung ba/slob dpon ma mchis pa/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bsnyen par dka' zhing
11b1(mdo sde): rtogs par dka' ba lags na/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
11b2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la chos kyi the tshom zhu ba dang /blta ba dang /phyag bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag ji lta ji ltar mchis pa
11b3(mdo sde): na/bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di snyam du sems lags te/bdag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba rnyed cing phyag bgyi ba rnyed la bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /zhu ba
11b4(mdo sde): dang /yongs su zhu bar bgyi ba rnyed do/bcom ldan 'das kyi da ltar bdag 'drir mchis pa la gdan gyi phyed gnang po ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam bgyid
11b5(mdo sde): lags so//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na mi dbul po des 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de la blta ba nyid dang /phyag bgyi ba nyid kyang ngo mtshar lags pa de bzhin du//
11b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam du sems te/de bzhin glashegs pa ni byamos pa chen po dang ldan zhing /thugs rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang
11b7(mdo sde): snyoms chen po dang ldan pa lags kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gang dag lags pa de dag ston pa ma gtogs par de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du bdag
12a1(mdo sde): ni phul dang /bdag ni mchog dang /bdag ni khyad par du 'phags pa'o snyam du mi dgongs pa ni ngo mtshar lags te/bdag ni 'di snyam du de bzhin/
12a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan de dag ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags so//snyam
12a3(mdo sde): bgyid lugs so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la bka' stsol pa/'od srungs lags so legs so//'od
12a4(mdo sde): srungs khyod yang lags so//'od srungs de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag tu med cing /dpag tu med pa'i chos dang ldan te/de ni sbyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang /sbyin pa'i
12a5(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang /shes rab kyi bar gyi tshad de lta bu dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang /smon lam rnams kyi ched de lta bu dang /
12a6(mdo sde): smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang /thabs kyi tshad de lta bu dang /thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang /spyod pa'i tshad de lta bu dang //
12a7(mdo sde): spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang /rnam par grol ba'i tshad de lta bu dang /rnam par grol ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang /rnam par grol ba'i
12b1(mdo sde): ye shes mthong ba'i tshad de lta bu dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bus dpag par mi nus so//'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni
12b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi mnyam pa'i ye shes rnams yin te/de dgra dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du sreng+ge'i sgra sgrogs par byed pa'o//bzhi
12b3(mdo sde): gang zhe na/tshul khrims mnyam pa nyid dang /ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid dang /shes rab mnyam pa nyid dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid do/'od srungs mi
12b4(mdo sde): mnyam pa'i ye shes bzhi po de dag ni gang dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs shing seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par byed pa'o//de nas
12b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//sangs rgyas 'jig rten bsam yas na//sangs rgyas ye shes mtha' yas te//sems
12b6(mdo sde): kyi las ni sbyangs pas na//de dag seng ge'i sgra sgrogs byed//seng gi'i sgra sgrogs byed pa ni//mu stegs gzhan rnams skrag par 'gyur//chos kyi chos nyid thos nas
12b7(mdo sde): su//g.yong sar rab tu ltung bar 'gyur//bdag tu 'du shes gang gnas dang //sems can 'du shes gang gnas pa//'od srungs de dag bstan 'di la//mu stegs
13a1(mdo sde): can zhes ngas bshad do//dngos po'i 'du shes gang gnas dang //nga yid zhes rten pa rnams//'od srungs de dag bstan 'di lnga//mu skyegs
13a2(mdo sde): can zhes ngas bshad do//gang dag tshul khrims phung po dang //bsam gtan rnams dang thos mang gis//rlom sems rnams rmongs de dag ni//'od srungs mu
13a3(mdo sde): stegs can rnams so//badrag ni cho ga shes 'dod chung dang //rab tu dben la gnas pa dang //chos gos ngan pa 'chang skam pa//'od srungs de ni mu stegs so///
13a4(mdo sde): dper na nam mkha' 'di la ni//lag pa bskyod kyang thogs med cing //dper na mkha' la rdul gyis kyang //nam yang gosde par mi 'gyur ba//de bzhin 'od srungs
13a5(mdo sde): ngas bstan pa'i//chos 'dir gang dag gnas de dag/nyon mongs rnams kyis mi gos te//mkha' las rdul dang sprin bzhin no//ji ltar mkha' la mi yis mi
13a6(mdo sde): tog spos rnams dang //de bzhin phreng ba byug pa rnams kyis 'dir mchod kyang //bdag mchod la la skye 'gyur 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes//de la blo gros kyang ni
13a7(mdo sde): 'byung bar mi 'gyur dang //ji ltar nam mkha' de la gos par mi 'gyur dang //ji ltar de yi rang bzhin gos par mi 'gyur dang //ji ltar de yi rang bzhin ngo bo
13b1(mdo sde): nyid kyis gsob//de bzhin dge sbyong dag la stod pa'i chos rnams so//ji ltar gang gis nam mkha' bsdigs pa dang //ji ltar nam du yang ni gshe bar mi 'gyur
13b2(mdo sde): ba//de bzhin dge sbyong dag la chos rnams gang dag yin//de dag nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med chos rnams//chos 'dir dge sbyong gang dag legs par bslabs/
13b3(mdo sde): rnams dang //gzhan dge slob pa rnams dang slob par 'gyur ba rnams//'di la nam du'ang gang dag 'chags par mi 'gyur ba//dra yis de dag dge sbyong legs bslabs/
13b4(mdo sde): rnams su bstan//ji ltar mkha' la nam yang lag pa mi thogs dang //rdul dang du ba rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur dang //ji ltar lam ni na mo yang byed par mi
13b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba//chos la de bzhin mos pa rnams ni dge sbyong yin//ji ltar sprin dang bral bar gyur pa'i num mkha' la//zla ba thogs pa med par mkha' lo 'gro byed
13b6(mdo sde): kyang //bdag gis bar snang la ni snang bar bya snyam du//de la rnam rtog de ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur bzhin//rgod med bdag nyid dge slong zla ba lta bu yis//sbyin pa'i/
13b7(mdo sde): bdag po'i khyim rnams su ni 'gro bar bya//rgod med nga rgyal rnam grol sems dang ldan pa dang //'jig rten chos rnams kyis ni ma gos sems ldan bya//khyim
14a1(mdo sde): rnams la ni nga rgyal spangs nas bsten par bya//der phyin nas kyang chos nyid rab tu brjod par bya//bde dang rnyed pa'i phyir ni 'dod pa'ang spangs nas
14a2(mdo sde): su/'jig rten rnam dag tshul khrims can du gnas par bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la bka' stsal pa/'od srungs longs
14a3(mdo sde): shig/longs la rang gi stan la 'dug cig/'od srungs khyod la chos kyi the tshom ji snyed yod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang /'od srungs ngas
14a4(mdo sde): dris pa lan btab pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//ngo nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po sa'i steng de nas langs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
14a5(mdo sde): bos phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas dzam+bu'i gling
14a6(mdo sde): 'di na dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad rgyal po'i kha bo 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa ga la
14a7(mdo sde): ba dang /bcom ldan 'das ge la ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/dge slong dang //
14b1(mdo sde): dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto
14b2(mdo sde): 'phye chen po gang dag yin pa de dag kyang 'od mi'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas par bzhugs te/de dag zhugs nas mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par shes par 'gyur ba de
14b3(mdo sde): lto bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas
14b4(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jog rten gyi khams na rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /tshangs pa chen po dang /'od
14b5(mdo sde): gaMsal dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /'og min gyi lha'i bu ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyal po'i khab 'od
14b6(mdo sde): ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag bo tsal te phyogs gcig
14b7(mdo sde): tu 'khod nos/bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan
15a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis yang rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas/klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /ma dros pa dang /snam bu'i dbang
15a2(mdo sde): phyug dang /gau ta ma dang /dga' bo dang /nye dga' dang /gzo can dang /'jog po dang /rab mdzes dang /e li'i 'dab dang /de dag dang gzhan
15a3(mdo sde): yang klu bye ba phrag stong sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lcags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/phyogs
15a4(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod cing rgya chen po'i lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye tshon
15a5(mdo sde): po dang /dge slong dong /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta kaM gnas par
15a6(mdo sde): zhugs nas gcig lce gcig nyam nga ba med pas 'khod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das
15a7(mdo sde): kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/maut+pal gyi bu khyod longs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan shoms shig/de bzhin gshegs pa
15b1(mdo sde): de la bzhugs nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par ston par 'gyur/sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa sgrub pa'i spyod pa
15b2(mdo sde): yang dag par ston par 'gyur//sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par ston par 'gyur/sems can thams cad chos la
15b3(mdo sde): yang dag par gzhol ba'i tshul gyi sgo rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya yang dag par ston par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa bsgrub pa yang dag
15b4(mdo sde): pAr ston par 'gyur/sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/
15b5(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur ba nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa'i bor du yang dag par ston par 'gyur/chos
15b6(mdo sde): thothams cad kyi tshul gyi sgo bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/sems can thams cad kyi dbang po bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/sems can thams
15b7(mdo sde): cad kyi gnas pa'i spyod pa bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par yang 'gyur/'khor bzhi yang dag par tshim par byed par 'gyur/lho dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /
16a1(mdo sde): dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor kyang yang dag par tshim par byed par 'gyur/
16a2(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dus la me chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang /de bzhin du da ltar dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma tshugs ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba
16a3(mdo sde): dang /lus kyi rnam par smin pa dang /spyod pa dang /smon lam rnams dang /ye shes kyi phyogs tsam zhig yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro//de nas tshe dang ldan pa
16a4(mdo sde): mr-it+pal gyi bu chen po stan lis langs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi gdun 'phang du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten sringad
16a5(mdo sde): cig ba shams so//steng gi bar snang la'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'chag sa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa ka tsa lin+da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/srid kyi tshad ni stong gi
16a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams dang ldan pa/rgyaru ni dpag tshad bdun brgya dang ldan pa zhig byas so//'chagos de la'ang rtsig pa rim pa bdun dang /rta babs rim pa bdun
16a7(mdo sde): dang /stegs bu rim pa bdun dang /dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba sprul to//'chags de'i g.yas g.yon su'ang 'di lta ste/gser
16b1(mdo sde): dang /dngul dang /shel dang /bai DUr+ya rin po che sna bzhi'i shing ljon pa dag mngon par sprul to//gser las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la dngul gyi lo ma dag dang /
16b2(mdo sde): shel gyi me tog dag dang /bai DUr+ya los byas pa'i 'bras bu dag dang /dngul las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la gser gyi lo ma dag dang /bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i
16b3(mdo sde): me tog dag dang /shel las byas pa'i 'bras bu dag dang /bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la gser gyi lo ma dag dang /dngul gyi me tog dag dang /shel
16b4(mdo sde): gyi 'bras bu dag dang /shel las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams lo gser gyi lo ma dag dang /dngul gyi me tog dag dang /bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i 'bras bu dag mngon par sprul to//
16b5(mdo sde): shing ljon pa thams cad kyi bar dag tu 'ang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus bkang ba'i rdzing them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/them skas de dag kyang rin po che sna bzhi gsir dang
16b6(mdo sde): dngul dang /bai DUr+ya dang /shel las byas pa/gser gyi bye me bdal ba ut+pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar pos khebs pa/steng gi bar snang la'ang/
16b7(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa zhig mngon par sprul to//'chags de'ang der gyi lde ldi mang pos sbyangs pa/bdug spos dri zhim pos bdugs pa/
17a1(mdo sde): mi bdun gyi sring tsam du me tog sna tshogs kyis bcul bkram pa zhig mngon par sprul to//ut+pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po de
17a2(mdo sde): dag la'ang maud+gal gyi bu dang 'dra ba'i dge slong dag mngon par sprul to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyis byas pa'i gdon de lta bu de mngon par
17a3(mdo sde): sprul te/bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phyin nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gdan bshams lags na/de'i dus la drang ba bar mkhyen
17a4(mdo sde): par mdzad du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maut+pal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/maud+gal gyi bu khyod kyis gang na bshams
17a5(mdo sde): zin tam/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bshams lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul mtha' yas pa la
17a6(mdo sde): dmigs pa bsgrub pa nges par ston pa la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri shoms shig/de bzhin gshegs pa de la
17a7(mdo sde): bzhugs nas sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa'
17b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po yul mtha' yas pa la dmigs pa bsgrub pa nges par stor pas/bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas gdan bshams so//gdan de shom pa na byang
17b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ji snyed 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis seng ge'i gdan der rang rang gi bla gos dge bting ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/bdag gis
17b3(mdo sde): ni 'di lta ste/the tshom dang sem nyi bsal ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi spyad pa bsgrub pa dang /'jug
17b4(mdo sde): pa bsgrub pa dang /smon lam bsgrub pa dang /zhing bgrod pa bsgrub pa dang /sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba bsgrub pa gang dag yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
17b5(mdo sde): de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa'i byung ba dang /nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba dang /
17b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba dang /chos bstan pa phur sum tshogs pa 'byung ba dang /tshe phun sum tshugs pa dang /mdog phun sum tshogs pA dang /
17b7(mdo sde): gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang /mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang /dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa dang /yang dag pa'i sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /dam pa'i chos
18a1(mdo sde): rab tu rnam par mi 'jig pa phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi chos gos drug las mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta
18a2(mdo sde): bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba des nges par mngon par 'du bya'i snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang mkhyen bzhin du gang+gA na de la bzhugs te/bcom
18a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das gdan de la bzhugs nas kyang yul mtha' yas pa la dmigs pa bsgrub pa nges par ston pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
18a4(mdo sde): si//de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos ji snyed pa de dag
18a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan du bting ngo //de dag gis rang rang gi chos gos de dag la bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan+da bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa nas/rab
18a6(mdo sde): tu rnam par mi 'jig pa phun sum tshogs pa'i bar du'ang mthong ngo //de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag yang dag par tshimo zhing yi rangs te/dga' ba dang dang ba
18a7(mdo sde): lo gnas nas bcom ldan 'das la sgra skad mthun par tshigs su bcad de bstod pa/cho ga spyod pa yon tan gnas gyur pa//chos rnams kun la dbang ldan bsnyengs
18b1(mdo sde): mi mnga'//yon tan kun la gnas pas khyod mdzes te//rgyal ba dbang ldan ting 'dzin yang dag gnas//g.yo dang sgyu ni khyod la yongs mi mnga'//nga rgyal rgod dang
18b2(mdo sde): tshul chos mi mnga' ste//rig dang rnam grol dog gi spyod pa mkhyen//ting 'dzin de la gnas pas khyod mdzes so//dbang ldan pa snying sngo bral ting 'dzin gnas nas su//rdzu 'phrul
18b3(mdo sde): mi mtshungs bla na med pa bstan//chags med ye shes bston phyir dbang ldan pa//ma 'ongs dus ni khyod kyis deng bstan to//mi g.yo go 'phang zhi ba thob snyam bgyid//de
18b4(mdo sde): ring byang chub la ni mchis skye ma bgyid//bdud dpung bcas pa rab tu bcom snyam bgyid//de ring rig pa rjes su thob snyam bgyid//rgyal bas gang gis 'dus byas stong
18b5(mdo sde): gzigs pa'i//bla med mig ni thob par 'gyur snyam bgyid//'chags med ye shes khyod kyis bka' drin la//mig kyang chags pa mchis pa yod ma lags//rnam par///
18b6(mdo sde): mthong yang ci yang ma mthong zhing //chos ni gang la'ang zhe 'grus ma mchis te//gang lo yid ni zhe 'gras ma mchis pa//de ni sangs rgyas spyan mchog de lags so//ji ltar
18b7(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas spyan mchog gis//khams gsum shes la ma chags 'jug pa bzhin//dngos dang dngos med mnyam mtshungs yid dang ldan//gang dag brtson
19a1(mdo sde): zhing rlung gi mig la gnas//gang tshe rgyal ba ting 'dzin der gnas te//de ring de dag kun gyis thob snyam bgyid//de dag gis ni gzungs sgo de dag drang //
19a2(mdo sde): chos la rnam par grol ba'i sgo mchog thob//sgor 'jug yongs su sbyang byas rnam dag pa//rgyal ba'i blo ni yong ye nyams mi 'gyur//sbyin pa chen po'i rnam smin de 'dra/
19a3(mdo sde): ste//khrims chen yon tan de dag de 'dra lags//shes rabo chen po'i yon tan de 'dra ste//sngon chad chos de dag ni bsten pa mdzod//khyod ni gradan bzhugs
19a4(mdo sde): bsam gtAn mdzad pa na//mi yi dbang po phyogs bcur lha ngar gyur//rgyal sras thugs kyi sras po'i 'dus de drag/gang nas shi 'phos las ni ci mchis pa//lha dang //
19a5(mdo sde): klu dang mi min mi 'am ci//kun la de ring shes pa de 'jug go/kun tu snang bar gyur pa'i ting 'dzin la//gang gis bskal byer shes pa de bskyed pa//som nyi gcod
19a6(mdo sde): cing the tshom sel ba yi//mi mchog seng ge bzhin du sgrogs par 'gyur//bdag dang gzhan la phan pa 'tshol ba na//'di ltar sngon chad sbyin pa stsal lags te//'di la
19a7(mdo sde): sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brtson gang //sems can kun la de 'drar bskal pa mnyam//sems can de dag thams cad ma btud par//'di ltar sbyin dang tshul khrims
19b1(mdo sde): bzod brtson gang //sems can kun la kun tu mkhas pas na//'di la ting 'dzin 'jug dang shes rab mchog/de snga na khyod kyis ting 'dzin rnam par sbyangs//dpa' bo de
19b2(mdo sde): ring gdan la bzhugs pa la//thal mo sbyar nas khyod la zhu lags na//som nyi bcad cing the tshom bsal du gsol//deng 'drir chos la kun tu snang thob cing //the tshom bral ste snang
19b3(mdo sde): ba thob gyur pas//sems can gang drag 'byung dang bdag cag la//chos kyi tshul ni yun ring gnas par 'gyur//gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o////yang de'i tshe
19b4(mdo sde): 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du pad+ma dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba gzhon nur gyur pa shig 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/de nas pad+ma dpal gyi snying po gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/bla
19b5(mdo sde): gos phrag pa gcig tu gzir nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sA la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log sri su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'dug go/de ltar 'dug pa dri'i
19b6(mdo sde): sems la rnam par rtog pa 'di lta bu byung ste/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pA la chos kyi sgo rnams zhu bar 'dod pa yin/rdo rje'i tshig rnams dang /rgyun mi gcod pa sgrub pa'i
19b7(mdo sde): tshig rnams zhu bar 'dod pa yin/smra ba thams cad char bcad pa sgrub pa'i tshig rnams dang /rim par phye ba'i tshig rnams dang /chos thams cad bsdu ba'i tshig rnams
20a1(mdo sde): zhu bar 'dod pa yin na/rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo dag phyag rgya'i sgo gang dag la bslabs na/chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mig dang shes pa la
20a2(mdo sde): mkhas pa nyid rjes su thob par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kye ma bdag gis bsam pa'i tshogs gang dag dang /'jug pa sgrub pa gang dag gis go cha bgos pa sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa
20a3(mdo sde): ba'i tshogs skye ba la bsam pa bsgrub pa'i tshogs la dgongs par 'gyur snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pad+ma dpal gyi snying po gzhon nur gyur pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud cing
20a4(mdo sde): smon lam dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshigs sgrub pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe phyogs bzhir rnam par gzigs so//phyogs bzhir gzigs pa na/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od
20a5(mdo sde): zer chen po bzhi byung ste/de dag byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu dong ngo //'od zer de dag kyang shing ljon pa 'am/rtsig pa'am/ri 'am/sa 'am/bar snang gang
20a6(mdo sde): du bab pa de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig tu gyur to//phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du'ang 'od zer de dag thogs pa med par rab tu dong ste/de ltar stong gsum
20a7(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'od de dag gis reg pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis rang gi lus dag gser gyi lus lta bur shes so//gang dag 'dod chags kyi
20b1(mdo sde): yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang /zhe sdang gis yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa dang /gti mug gis yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa de dag thams cad kyis
20b2(mdo sde): ni bdag nyid 'dod chags chung ba dang /zhe sdang chung ba dang /gti mug chung bar mngon par shes so//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba ji snyed yod pa de
20b3(mdo sde): ngag tu sems can skyes pa gang dgra sdug bsngal che ba mi zad pa 'chi ba'i mu thar byed pa'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba de dag thams cad kyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu dang /byang chub sems dpa'
20b4(mdo sde): de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus bde ba snyam du shes par gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa
20b5(mdo sde): dang /las kyi rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang /bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu dang /byang chub sems dpa' de'i sngon gyi
20b6(mdo sde): smon lam gyis sgrib pa dang bral bar gyur to//de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba cher gsal bar bya ba'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyis spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer dag phyung ste/
20b7(mdo sde): 'od zer de dag kyang shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag 'das so//de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /steng dang /'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag
21a1(mdo sde): 'dus so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer de dag phyung nas gsung bsal ba'i sgra mdzad do//gsung bsal ba'i sgra des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mngon par
21a2(mdo sde): go bar gyur to//de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
21a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
21a4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od 'di ni nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
21a5(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to//de nas de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig
21a6(mdo sde): pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gsung bsal ba'i sgra dang /'od kyi snang ba chen po gda' ba de su'i lags/de skad
21a7(mdo sde): ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pas byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi
21b1(mdo sde): 'od la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de
21b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems ba'i sde snod sems can thams
21b3(mdo sde): cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to//'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po pad+ma dpal gyi snying po zhes byi ba 'dus te/bcom
21b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thob pa de la 'di lta ste/chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyag rgya yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo zhu bar 'dod do//dra ba can gyi 'od sangs rgyas
21b5(mdo sde): kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa/tha mi dad par spyod pa'i go cha bgos pa dge 'khor der 'dus te 'khod do//dra ba can gyi 'od byang chub
21b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha de dag dang ldan pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang stongs so//dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
21b7(mdo sde): skyes pa gang dag yin pa de dag mthong ba dang thos pa'ing byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi gces spras byed par nga sman/dra ba can gyi 'od gang dag gis de dag mthong nas bkur sti byed dam/bla mar byed
22a1(mdo sde): dam/ri mor byed dam/mchod par byed dam/'dri bar byed pa lta ci smos/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
22a2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la lta ba dang /phyag bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang //
22a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang blta bar bgyi'o//
22a4(mdo sde): do skad ces gsol pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs
22a5(mdo sde): kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na song la sangs rgyas kyi zhing der shes bzhin du'ang spyod cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de na gnas pa'i byang chub
22a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag bsnyen par dka' ba'i phyir ro//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra
22a7(mdo sde): ba can gyi 'od la lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la byin te/dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la khyod kyis lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la 'dis mchod cig/nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan
22b1(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/nyam nga ba nyung ngam/bskyod pa yang ngam/stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes
22b2(mdo sde): bsnun gsol lo zhes de skad ces gsol cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
22b3(mdo sde): rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig
22b4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba der song ste/sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'dug par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can
22b5(mdo sde): gyi 'od rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa ga la ba der song nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der yang song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te 'di/
22b6(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das bdag dra ba can gyi 'od lags so//
22b7(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa bdag dra ba can gyi 'od lags te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems
23a1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dra ba can gyi 'od khyod yun ring du 'tsho bar gyur cig/khyod bde ba dang nad med par gyur cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa'
23a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyug btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
23a3(mdo sde): chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/
23a4(mdo sde): nyam nga ba nyung ngam/bskyod pa yang ngam/stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes bsnun gsol lo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
23a5(mdo sde): /rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa des bcom ldan 'das la lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la 'di'ang bskur lags na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od las lag pa lta bu'i ut+pal
23a6(mdo sde): bzhes su gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la bzhes nas byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pa la byin na/de nas byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pas lag pa lta bu'i
23a7(mdo sde): ut+pa la de thogs nas byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la sogs pa lnga brgya la smras pa/rgan rabs dag lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas byin pa'o//de nas bzang skyong
23b1(mdo sde): la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya po de dag gis lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la de thogs nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag de ltar yang
23b2(mdo sde): dag par zhugs pa lags na/ci bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sems can gang dag gis ming thos par gyur pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
23b3(mdo sde): nges par 'gyur lags sam/bcom ldan 'das lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pas bdag cag la stsal lags te/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni lag pa lta bu'i
23b4(mdo sde): ut+pa la 'di rang gi smon lam gyi stobs dang /spyod pa'i stobs dang /bsam pa'i stobs dang /sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs
23b5(mdo sde): ba'i slad du lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la de gtor por bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs te 'tsho
23b6(mdo sde): zhing gzhes pa dag dang /gang dag ma byung ba dag dang /'byung bar 'gyur ba dag dang /'byung ba 'am 'jig pa der yang bcom ldan 'das gtor bar bgyi'o//de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /de bzhin du
23b7(mdo sde): nub phyogs dang /de bzhin du byang phyogs dang /de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang /de bzhin du steng gi phyogs dang /de bzhin du phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na sangs rgyas
24a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ji snyed byung ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu'ang gtor bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gang su dag gis lagra pa lta bu'i ut+pa lA
24a2(mdo sde): dri mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ut+pa lA'i dri snom par gyur cig/de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig/de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi
24a3(mdo sde): zhing thams cad du'ang mchi bar gyur cig de dag gis leg pa lta bu'i ut+pa lA de gtor nas de nas de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis phyog g.yas pas reg ste/lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la de bcom
24a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis reg nas kyang de nas de ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la ut+pa lA de'i nang nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyed mngon par byung zhing ut+pa la re re las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
24a5(mdo sde): phyid mngon par byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyed po de dag gis gang dag chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mi shes shing mos par mi byed la/chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa dang //
24a6(mdo sde): chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par mi shes shing mos par mi byed/khong du chud par mi byed pa de dag gi ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin zhing /de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan
24a7(mdo sde): zothos dag kyang ma yin no zhes de lta bu'i tshig de dag gsungs te/gsungs nas kyang bzhud do//tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang bka' stsal to//sgyu ma 'dra chos gzung du med pa ste//gzung min
24b1(mdo sde): thams cad chu zla 'dra ba yin//stong pas stong pa'i rang bzhin mi 'dzin pa//chos nyid 'di ni rgyal bas de 'drar gsungs//mtshan nyid med chos rnam dag mtshan nyid yin//mtshan nyid med pa'i
24b2(mdo sde): rang bzhin de 'angadra ste//brtags pas stong zhing bdag med chos rnams la//'dzin pa med cing rtsod pa med par 'gyur//gang dag de ltar chos nyid de 'dod pa//de dag ston pa rgyal ba mthu bo che//phyogs
24b3(mdo sde): bcur 'jig rten spyod pa thams cad la//de 'dra 'di ni de yi byin rlabs so//de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs nas phyogs bcur bzhud do////
24b4(mdo sde): bam po gnyis pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji tsam
24b5(mdo sde): du smon lam dag shin tu yongs su spangs pa dang /sems can gang dag gis de dag gi smon lam de dag thos pa dang /ming yang bsgrags pa de dag sdug bsngal mang pos reg pa'i sdug bsngal de
24b6(mdo sde): dag las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar lags so//bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das dang rigs
24b7(mdo sde): kyi bu de dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'byung ba'i tshe ma lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na skyes pa 'am bud med la la zhig rin thang ma mchis pa'i nor bu rin po
25a1(mdo sde): che dri ma thams cad dang bral ba phan pa dang bde ba thams cad nye bar sgrub par bgyid pa'i nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan bsgrags pa thos nas yongs su btsal bar sems
25a2(mdo sde): shing //nor bu rin po che de'i mtshan ma dag kyang legs par 'dzin par bgyid la/cheb khung sa 'am de las gzhan mi gtsang ba dang 'dres pa'i phyogs dag na nor bu rin po che shin tu yongs su
25a3(mdo sde): byang ba de 'dam du stsal ba mthong zhing /lhag par yang nor bu rin po che de'i khor yug na smyig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam/gdol pa'i rigs sam/g.yung po'i rigs sam/de dag las
25a4(mdo sde): gzhan yang tshogs kyis 'tsho ba dma' ba'i rigs dag mchis par gyur na/de dag nor bu rin po che de'i ming yang ma 'tshal na yon tan 'tshal bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/de ni
25a5(mdo sde): gnas ma mchis lags so//de nas mi des mi gtsang bar stsal pa'i nor bu rin po che de mthong nas nor bu rin po che de'i snod ni mdzes pa ma yin no zhes de skad ces smra bar bgyid la/de
25a6(mdo sde): nas dma' ba'i mi de dag 'di skad ces smra bar bgyid de/khyod kyis gang gis bsngags pa smras pa'i nor bu rin po che de gang yin zhes de skad ces smras pa dang /mi des nor bu rin po che de
25a7(mdo sde): bstan la/de ston pa na mi byis pa'i rang bzhin can de dag ma 'tshal bzhin du/kye mi khyod kyis nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan ci'i phyir smras/khyod kyis gang smras pa'i nor bu rin po che de'i
25b1(mdo sde): yon tan de dag ni yod pa ma yin no//khyod ni rdzun du smra ba/gzhan du smra ba ste/khyod kyi tshig de dag yid mi ches so zhes smras la/de'i tshe mi des nor bu rin po che de mi gtsang ba'i gnas de nas mngon/
25b2(mdo sde): par bteg cing blangs nas mchis te/de nas nor bu rin po che de phyung nas mi de mchis ma thag tu mi dbul po'i rang bzhin can de dag gcig la gcig shin tu rab tu rnam par 'khrugs par gyur nas
25b3(mdo sde): de'i rjes la gnod pa mang pos yongs su bskor ba bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed dbul pos gtam par
25b4(mdo sde): mchis lags te/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyis snod du stsal ba'i nor bu rin po che de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi des ngo 'tshal ba de lta bur ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig
25b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams mi mjed na bdag cag blta bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bde ba thams cad nye bar bsgrub par bgyid pa'i nor bu rin po che de legs par sbyangs shing rnam par dag pa de lta bur
25b6(mdo sde): ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag blta bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nor bu
25b7(mdo sde): rin po che de'i khor yug na dma' bas 'tsho ba dbul po dma' ba'i mi de dag gnas pa de lta bur ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na de dag las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams
26a1(mdo sde): blta bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar skyes pa 'am/bud med kyis nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan dag thos nas/nor bu rin po che de yongs su btsal par sems
26a2(mdo sde): shing /mi gtsang ba'i snod nas mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che de mthong nas kyang /nor bu rin po che de'i snod de ni 'tsham pa ma yin no zhes smra bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das
26a3(mdo sde): phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag lags pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni 'tsham pa ma yin no zhes sangs rgyas
26a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi bsngags pa brjod lags so//bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na skyes
26a5(mdo sde): pa'am/bud med kyis nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan dag thos nas yongs su btsal bar sems shing /mi gtsang ba'i snod na mchis pa de'ang mthong nas/snod de ni 'tsham pa ma yin no zhes tshig
26a6(mdo sde): smra bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
26a7(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa thos nas blta ba'i slad du bdag cag 'dir mchis te/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis nas bdag
26b1(mdo sde): cag gis ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gnod pa brgya phrag du mas gtam zhing sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa dag gis gtam par mthong lags so//bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na 'dam
26b2(mdo sde): dustsal ba'i nor bu rin po che de'i 'od de mi 'dor ba de bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi
26b3(mdo sde): khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi 'od de mi 'dor lags te/'dir ni sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang mos pa chung ba'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od 'dom gang tsam du byin gyis rlob par
26b4(mdo sde): mdzad lags so//bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na mi de nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan dag sgrogs pa na mi dbul ba'i rang bzhin can de dag mngon par yid mi ches pa de bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das sems
26b5(mdo sde): can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od shin tu rgyas pa'am/smon lam chen po 'am/rnam par 'phrul pa chen po 'am/sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dag la'ang yid ches par mi bgyid na/byang chub sems
26b6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi la lnga smos kyang ci 'tshal/bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na mi des mi gtsang ba'i snod de nas nor bu rin po che de blangs nas mchis la/de mchis ma thag tu'ang sems
26b7(mdo sde): can de dag gnod pa rnam pa du mas shas che ri yongs su bskor ba de bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
27a1(mdo sde): po de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du mchis nas/'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'dzin pa/byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzin du stsol ba rnams gcig la gcig rab tu rnam
27a2(mdo sde): par 'khrug par 'gyur zhing /chos kyi sgra'ang 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/chos ma lags pa nyid kyi sgra 'byung ba kho nar bas so zhes de skad ces gsol pa legs so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar
27a3(mdo sde): sems can de dag ni chos ma lags pa la gnas par 'gyur zhing chos ma lags pas 'tsho ba nyid yang dag par blangs nas gnas par 'gyur la/gcig la gcig 'thab mo dang /sun 'byin
27a4(mdo sde): pa dang /mtshang 'dru ba dang /smod pa la 'jug par bgyid par 'gyur te/de dag gcig la gcig dge ba'i chos las nyams nas sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur zhing /de dag chos sogs pa dang /
27a5(mdo sde): dge ba sogs pa lhur len par mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dron 'tshal ba/don yongs su 'chol bar 'tshal ba/sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
27a6(mdo sde): yang dag par sgrub par 'tshal ba dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skye bar mi bgyi na/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/de ci'i slad
27a7(mdo sde): du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa dang /yang sos dang /thig nag dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu tsha ba dang /de dag las gzhan pa sems
27b1(mdo sde): can dmyal ba chen po dag tu sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag la skad cig thang cig yud tsam yang bde ba mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
27b2(mdo sde): pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gdugs gcig pa na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag mchis pa de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na sems can
27b3(mdo sde): mnar med par skyes pa rnams dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dir skyes pa de dag la'ang bde ba ci'ang yang dag par rjes su mu mthong lags so//sangs rgyas kyi zhing
27b4(mdo sde): bde ba gcig pu mchog tu gyur pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can de dag ni rang bzhin gyis bde ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can 'dir skyes pa rnams kyis
27b5(mdo sde): de mngon par yid ches par dka' bar 'gyur bar smra lags te/bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang chos kyi the tshom gcad pa dang /chos kyi phyag rgya'i sgo mnyan pa'i slad du gang gi don du bdag 'dir
27b6(mdo sde): mchis pa de bcom ldan 'das las bdag cag thos par 'tshal lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das bde ba dang sdug bsngal de dag thams cad mi rtag pa lags pa'i slad du'o//bcom
27b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las gang la bde ba ma mchis pa dang /sdug bsngal ba ma mchis pa dang /rtag pa ma mchis pa dang /mi
28a1(mdo sde): rtag pa ma mchis pa dang /rtog pa ma mchis pa dang /rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa dang /dngos po ma mchis pa dang /dngos po ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang /'dus
28a2(mdo sde): byas ma mchis pa dang /'dus ma byas ma mchis pa dang /gdags pa ma mchis pa dang /gdags pa ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang /'jig rten ma mchis pa dang /'jig rten las
28a3(mdo sde): 'das pa ma mchis pa dang /zag pa dang bcas pa ma mchis pa dang /zag pa ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang /bden pa ma mchis pa dang /brdzun pa ma mchis pa dang /byang chub
28a4(mdo sde): ma mchis pa dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma mchis pa dang /stobs rnams ma mchis pa dang /snang ba ma mchis pa dang /mun pa ma mchis pa dang /rnam par rig pa ma mchis
28a5(mdo sde): pa dang /rnam par rig pa ma lags pa ma mchis pa dang /'bras bu ma mchis pa dang /'bras bu ma lags pa ma mchis pa dang /lam ma mchis pa dang /lam ma lags pa ma mchis
28a6(mdo sde): pa dang /'jug pa ma mchis pa dang /mthar thug pa ma mchis pa dang /'jig rten ma mchis pa dang /'jig rten nas nges par 'byung ba ma mchis pa rnam pa de lta bu'i chos thos par 'tshal
28a7(mdo sde): lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi tshogs las yang dag par byung ba/kun rtog pa las byung ba'i bde ba de dag dang gzhan thams cad 'jig rten la bstan
28b1(mdo sde): par bgyi ba'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni bstan du mi rung lags te/bcom ldan 'das de la stobs rnams ma mchis/mi 'jigs pa rnams ma mchis/rdzu 'phrul
28b2(mdo sde): ma mchis/rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ma mchis/kun brjod pa ma mchis/kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ma mchis/rjes su bstan pa ma mchis/rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ma mchis lags so//
28b3(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa rnams ma mchis shing stobs rnams ma mchis la/bde ba ma mchis shing sdug bsngal ba ma mchis lags te/de dag thams cad ni rlom sems lags shing /de dag thams cad
28b4(mdo sde): ni g.yo ba lags pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid rjes su thob pa dang /rjes su ma thob pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi ba ma
28b5(mdo sde): lags te/'di ltar de dag thams cad ni g.yo ba dang /rlom sems dang /g.yos pa dang /spros pa lags pa'i slad du'o//de bzhin gshegs pas ni bden pa 'am/brdzun pa'am/'dus byas
28b6(mdo sde): sam/'dus ma byas sam/zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/zag pa ma mchis pa 'am/kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am/kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa 'am/'jig rten pa 'am/'jig rten las 'das
28b7(mdo sde): pa'am/tshul khrims sam/'chal ba'i tshul khrims sam/stobs rnams sam/stobs ma mchis pa 'am/mi 'jigs pa 'am/mi 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'am/sbyin gnas sam/
29a1(mdo sde): sbyin gnas ma lags pa 'am/de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/sangs rgyas sam/byang chub sems dpa' 'am/nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyas sam/smon lam
29a2(mdo sde): rnams sam/byin gyi rlabs rnams kyi rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom zhing lam yongs su mkhyen te/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni bag tsha ba mi mnga' bar seng ge lta
29a3(mdo sde): bu dang /glang po che lta bu'i sgra sgrogs par mdzad lags so//de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na mi mthun pa rnams lo mi mthun pa'i 'du shes can du gnas par mdzad/mthun pa rnams la mthun
29a4(mdo sde): pa'i 'du shes can du gnas par mdzad do//de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du de gnyis kas kyang btang snyoms par gnas par mdzad do//bcom
29a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa dag dang /rang byung gi gnas pa dag dang /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /yang thun mong
29a6(mdo sde): ma lags pa'i gnas pa dag lags na/de dag las gzhan pa'i sems can tha chad rnams dang thun mong ma lags pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du thun
29a7(mdo sde): mong ma lags zhe na/de las gzhan pa'i sems can tha chad kyis de lta bu'i gnas pa de dag dang /de snyed kyi gnas pa de dag dang /yun ji srid nas gnas pa de dag dang /sbyor ba de lta bu'i gnas pa de
29b1(mdo sde): dag dang /bde ba de lta bu'i gnas pa de dag 'tshal bar rngo mi thog cing /bcom ldan 'das de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dang bral ba'i sems can rnams kyi gnas de dag 'tshal bar rngo mi thogs pa'i
29b2(mdo sde): srad du'o//bcom ldan 'das de dag ni sems can gzhan dag gi spyod yul ma lags zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de lta bu de dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod
29b3(mdo sde): yul ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das spyod yul ma lags zhes bgyi ba ni spyod pa ma mchis shing /rnam par spyod pa ma mchis pa ste/des na spyod yul ma lags zhes bgyi'o//de ci'i slad
29b4(mdo sde): du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de la nyan thos dag gam/rang sangs rgyas dag gi spyod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das gnas pa de mtha' yas pa'i slad
29b5(mdo sde): du'o//bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gnas pa mtha' yas pa lags she na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi mos pa ni mtha' yas te/grang gis kyang 'tshal bar rngo mi thog lpags so///
29b6(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das gnas pa de ni yi ge ma mchis pa lags te/yi ge ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags la/yi ge ni brjod pa kho na lags pas de'i slad du
29b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de ni rang byung gi gnas pa ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das gang dag gnas pa de la rnam par lta bar mi 'gyur zhing rab tu 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag 'jig rten gyi khams
30a1(mdo sde): gzhan nas shi 'phos pa lags so//gang dag gnas pa de glo bar chud par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni gnod pa chen po dang ldan par 'tshal bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan
30a2(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de ni bcom ldan 'das don gyi sgo dang /chos kyi sgo de lags te/'khor sgo drug khri brgyad stong dang ldan pa lags so//de bzhin gshegs pa rin po
30a3(mdo sde): che'i bkod pa gcig pa'i byang chub ni nam mkha' lta bur tshad ma mchis shing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sgo gcig pa'i tshad las rjes su thob pa lags so//sgo'i
30a4(mdo sde): tshig 'di bstan cing bshod pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun khri bdun skyong gis ni sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi sgo rjes su thob ste/'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
30a5(mdo sde): gnas pa de nyid do//de dag thams cad kyis bdag cag gis deng byang chub thob bo//bdag cag gis deng byang chub thob bo zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang smras so//srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu ni
30a6(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes te/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
30a7(mdo sde): to//srog chags bye ba khrag khrig sa yo phrag brgyad ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral po skyes so//dge slong sum stong ni len pa med par zag po rnams las sems
30b1(mdo sde): rnam par grol lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad de/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad nas kyang /de nas de ma thag tu de'i tshe 'jig rten du 'od chen po byung bar gyur cing /sa
30b2(mdo sde): chen po'ang g.yos par gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su
30b3(mdo sde): zal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di snyed ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang /'jig rten du snang ba chen po byung ba dang /'jig rten du sa chen po g.yos pa'i
30b4(mdo sde): rgyu ni gang lags/rkyen ni gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od kyis chos kyi skyong bstan cing bshad pa na/byang chub sems dpa'
30b5(mdo sde): bdun khri bdun skyong gos sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i sgro thob par gyur cing /kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od kyis chos kyi sgra'i tshig bstan pa de ni nam mkhas yongs su zin
30b6(mdo sde): pA'i sa phyogs de nyid du sangs rgyas brgyad stong las blangs te/blangs nas kyang de'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi sgos nges par byung ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi
30b7(mdo sde): zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba la mkhas par gyur pa'i phyir ro//yang de'i tshe shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa bdun cu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che brtsegs
31a1(mdo sde): ba gcig pa/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cherna mtha' yas khyu margyag ces bya ba ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la kho/
31a2(mdo sde): 'bum phrag du ma la chos kyang ston to//bcom ldan 'das de'i rgyal chab byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam por gnon ces bya ba de 'khor der 'dus par
31a3(mdo sde): gyur te 'dug nas/de gsung bsal ba'i sgra de thos te/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i 'od de'ang mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog la 'di skad
31a4(mdo sde): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gsung bsal ba'i sgra dang 'od gda' ba de su'i lags/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha'
31a5(mdo sde): yas khyu mchog gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon de la bka' stsal pa/don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon nub phyogs su sangs rgyas
31a6(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'dri nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa bdun cu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
31a7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/'di lta ste/sems dpa' dpe med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las brtsams nas byang chub
31b1(mdo sde): sems dpa'i sde snod sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa/sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to//de nas de bzhin gshegs
31b2(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
31b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang /phyag bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /sems dpa' dpe med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
31b4(mdo sde): chen po dge blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog gis
31b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la dbab par shes na rigs kyi bu khyod seng la sangs rgyas
31b6(mdo sde): kyi zhing der shes bzhin du gnas par byos shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
31b7(mdo sde): po gang dag skyes pa de dag bsnyen par dka' ba'i phyir ro//nga'i tshig gis gnod pa chung ngam/nyam nga ba nyung ngam/bskyod pa yang ngam/stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes bsnun
32a1(mdo sde): gsol la/de bzhin gshegs pa de la lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma 'di'ang phul cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam parwa gnon stan
32a2(mdo sde): las langs nas/bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bskor ba'ang byas nas byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams
32a3(mdo sde): mi mjed tu 'ongs te/de 'ongs nas de ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed na me tog gi shing ngam/'bras bu'i shing ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis de'i tshe dus ma yin pa'i me tog
32a4(mdo sde): dag dang /dus ma yin pa'i 'bras bu dag gtor to//me tog gi chur pa'ang bab bo//spos kyi char pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang bab bo//rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang grag go/
32a5(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dron yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshil bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das
32a6(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/lag pa gnyis gas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la bzung ngo //gdong gis kyang yongs su gtugs te/tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to//bcom
32a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
32b1(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon bkur sti byas pa dang /mchod pa dang /
32b2(mdo sde): ri mo byas par gyur cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon sa las langs te spyan sngar 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
32b3(mdo sde): to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/nyam nga ba nyung ngam/
32b4(mdo sde): bskyod pa yang ngam/stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/zhes bsnyun gsol zhing /bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma bskur ba lags na/bcom ldan
32b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon las bzhes su gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par
32b6(mdo sde): gnon las lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma de bzhes te/bzhes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon la bka' stsal pa/don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon ci
32b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog gnod pa chung ngam/nyam nga ba nyung ngam/'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin
33a1(mdo sde): chen mtha' yas khyu mchog de gnod pa chung zhing stobs dang ldan la 'gyur ba mi mnga' ste/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bde bar reg pa la gnas lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das
33a2(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa la lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma de byin no//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pas lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma de blangs nas
33a3(mdo sde): tshig gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
33a4(mdo sde): su dag par gyur cig/sems can yongs su smin par gyur cig/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das sems can yongs su ma smin pa rnams la cho so bstan pa dang /sems can dge ba'i
33a5(mdo sde): rtsa ba ma skyes pa rnams dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu rnams dang /dman pa la mos pa rnams la chos bstan pa dka' ba'i slad du ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma
33a6(mdo sde): 'di las 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed mthong bar 'tshal ba de snyed kyang mthong ba dang /lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma 'di nyid las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu
33a7(mdo sde): mchog de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i phung po zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de'ang mthong ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag theg pa la yang dag par zhugs
33b1(mdo sde): pa de dag kyang mthong ba dang /de na gang nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa phal cher rig pa gsum dang ldan pa dang /rig pa drug dang ldan pa de dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o//bcom ldan
