403b4(mdo sde): po bye ba stong phrag sum cu'ang dzam+bu'i gling 'dir lhags so//yi dgas dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga'ang lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor nas lhags te/bcom
403b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus pa chen po kun tu gnas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gzhon nu de dag la chos bstan pa dang /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas/
403b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba stong phrag brgya rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags so////bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma//de nas byang chub sems dpa'
403b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub
404a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'dus shing mchis pa mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das lha dang klu 'dus shing mchis pa'ang mang ngo //skyin po bye
404a2(mdo sde): ba phrag du ma zhig kyang lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor nas lhags te 'dus nas mchis par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi
404a3(mdo sde): sde la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu mar shog/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis steng nas babs nas/bcom ldan 'das
404a4(mdo sde): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos kyi phung po chos kyi phung po zhes bgyi ba/bcom ldan
404a5(mdo sde): 'das ji tsam gyis na chos kyi phung po zhes bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba ni gang tshangs par spyod pa yongs su 'tshol zhing
404a6(mdo sde): gang tshangs par spyod pa yongs su btsal nas kyang sdig pa thams cad spong ba'o//rigs kyi bu sems can gzhon nu mi tshangs par spyod pa spangs nas gdon mi zo bar gzungs rab tu 'thob par
404a7(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing chos thams cad dang yang ldan par 'gyur ba de dag mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das thabs gang giso sems can mang po zhig 'dus shing chos kyi phung po nyan//
404b1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la bka' stsal pa/sman gyi sde gang dag skye ba nyid du sdug bsngal du mi nyan/rga shi nyid du sdug bsngal
404b2(mdo sde): du ma nyin/nad nyid sdug bsngal dang /mya ngan sdug bsngal dang /smre sngags 'don po sdug bsngal dang /sdug pa dang bral ba sdug bsngal dang /mi sdug pa dang phrad pa sdug
404b3(mdo sde): bsngal du mi nyan pa'i sems can yang phal cher yod de/'chi ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad kyi phyir lus dang srog 'phrog pa yin te/sman gyi sde 'di ni sdug bsngal thams cad ces bya'o///
404b4(mdo sde): de nas sems can gzhon nu de dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
404b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang 'gum par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyed dang sems can thams cad kyang 'chi'o//de dag gis gsol pa/bcom
404b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das ji ltar 'chi ba'i dus kyis non par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag 'chi ba'i dus na rnam par shes pa tha ma la rnam par shes pa 'gag par
404b7(mdo sde): byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung dang /rnam par shes pa 'khrul par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung dang /rnam par shes pa 'khrug par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung dang /rigs kyi bu rlung gsum po
405a1(mdo sde): 'di dag gis 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa tha ma la klong bar 'gyur/'khrul par 'gyur/'khrug pa skyed par 'gyur ro//de dag gis gsol
405a2(mdo sde): pa/bcom ldan 'das 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa 'gag pa na lus 'jom par bgyid pa'i rlung gsum po gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
405a3(mdo sde): grogs po dag mtshon zhes bya ba dang /skul ba zhes bya ba dang /zed pa zhes bya bas lus 'jom par byed do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das lus zhes bgyi ba ji lta
405a4(mdo sde): bu lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/grogs po dag kun tu 'bar ba zhes kyang bya/tshig pa zhes kyang bya/ngar snabs zhes kyang bya/sgregs pa zhes
405a5(mdo sde): kyang bya/dur khrod pa zhes kyang bya/ngan pa'i blo zhes kyang bya/khur lci ba zhes kyang bya/skye bos yongs su gzir ba zhes kyang bya/skye bas kun tu dkrugs pa zhes kyang
405a6(mdo sde): srog yongs su gdung ba zhes kyang bya/'chi ba dang sdug pa dang bral bar byed pa zhes kyang bya ste/grogs po dag 'di rnams ni lus zhes bya'o//de dag gis gsol
405a7(mdo sde): po/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'gum/ji ltar 'chi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/grogs po dag rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba'o//
405b1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa bsod nams zhes bya ba ni 'tsho ba'o//grogs po dag lus zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba ste/rgyus pa bye bas ni bkris/spu'i khung brgyad khri bzhi stong dang ni ldan/yan lag
405b2(mdo sde): khri nyis stong gis ni sbrel/rus pa sum brgya drug cus ni bstan/lus kyi nang na srin bu'i rigs brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni gnas te/srog chags de dag thams cad la'ang 'chi ba'ang
405b3(mdo sde): yod/'chi ba 'gog pa'ang yod do//nam mi de 'chi ba de na srog chags de dag thams cad re thag chod par 'gyur te/de na srog chags thams cad gcig la gcig zla bas
405b4(mdo sde): rlung 'khrug cing g.yo bar 'gyur te/de na de dag sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ngo //la la ni bu'i phyir mya ngan byed/la la ni bu mo'i phyir mya ngan byed/la la ni gnyen gyi phyir
405b5(mdo sde): mya ngan byed de/de dag thams cad mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug go//gcig la gcig za bar brtsams nas de dag gcig gis gcig zos te srog tshogs gnyis shig las po na de
405b6(mdo sde): gnyis kyang zhag bdun gyi bar du 'thabs te zhag bdun 'das pa dang /srog chags gcig ni bcom mo//gcig ni thar to//tshe dang ldan pa chos zhes bya ba gang zhe na/'di
405b7(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ji ltar srog chags rnams gcig la gcig mi mthun par byas nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du byas pa so so'i skye bo'i sems can rnams kyang gcig la
406a1(mdo sde): gcig mi mthun pa byed de skye bas mi 'jigs/rga bas mi 'jigs/nad kyis mi 'jigs/'chi bas mi 'jigs so//ji ltar srog chags
406a2(mdo sde): gnyis 'thab pa bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang phan tshun 'thab bo//de nas 'chi ba'i dus na skyes bu dge ba rnams kyis smras pa/skyes bu khyod ci zhig la
406a3(mdo sde): yid rton/ci khyod kyis nyes pa cung zad kyong ma mthong ngam/skye ba'i nyes pa ma mthong ngam/rga ba dang na pa'i nyes pa ma mthong ngam/'tshe ba'i nyes pa ma mthong
406a4(mdo sde): ngam/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis skye ba'i nyes pa'angango mthong ngo //rga ba dang na ba'i nyes pa'ang mthong ngo //thams cad kyi tha mar 'chi ba'i nyes pa'ang mthong
406a5(mdo sde): ngo //smras pa/ci'i phyir gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis bya ba ma byas/ci'i phyir 'jig rten gnyis kar bde ba 'phel ba'i chos kyi phung po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma
406a6(mdo sde): byas/grogs po dag gnyis su'ang dri'o//khyod ci'i phyir skye ba dang /'chi ba las yongs su thar pa'i dge ba'i tshogs ma byas/khyod kyi ci'i phyir tshul bzhin yid
406a7(mdo sde): lo byed pa so sor brtag pa ma byas/ji ltar khyod kyis sa lo gaN+DI brdung ba'i sgra ma thos/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing la dge ba'i sa bon bskrun cing spos sam/phreng
406b1(mdo sde): ba'am/mar me sbyin pa byin pa ma mthong /de bzhin gshegs pa la bza' ba dang /bca' ba 'bul ba dang /'khor bzhi tshim par byas pa'ang ma mthong /dge
406b2(mdo sde): slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma bstan pa la mngon par dad pa de dag ni 'khor bzhi'o//de ltar de la phan pa'i phyir smras te/bsnyad pa dang /
406b3(mdo sde): lha cung zad kyang ma bgyis so//mi khyod kyis ni dzam+bu'i gling du 'ongs nas mi dge ba byas so//de'i tshe mi shi ba de la chos kyi rgyal pos rjes su bstan pa'i tshogs su bcad pa
406b4(mdo sde): smras pa/de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung mthong zhing //gaN+DI brdung ba thos gyur lo//mya ngan 'das pa zhir 'gro ba'i//chos bsten thos kyang ma byas so//de nas mi
406b5(mdo sde): des slar smras pa//bdag ni byis pa'i blor gyur te//sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song nas//'dod pas 'khrul pa'i sems kyis su//bdag gis sdig pa'i las byas
406b6(mdo sde): so//'dod pa dag kyang bsten po dang //bdag gis srog chags rnams kyang bsad//dge 'dun rnams kyang chud gsan pas//mi bzad de yi 'bras bu 'ong //gnod
406b7(mdo sde): par sems pa'i yid kyis su//bdag gis mchod rten shig pa byas//tshig ngan rnams kyang rab tu smras//bdag gi ma yang gdung bar byas//bdag gis lus kyis
407a1(mdo sde): gang byas pa//nyes pa dag kyang rab tu shes//sems dmyal chen po ngu 'bod du//shin tu mi bzang skye ba mthong //bsdus gzhom du'ang tshor ba myong //
407a2(mdo sde): de bzhin rab tu tsha ba dang //mnar med chen po mi bzad par//tshor ba rjes su myong bar 'gyur//pad+ma lta bur cher gas pa'i//sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal du
407a3(mdo sde): thig nag btab pa 'jigs chen du//lan brgya bar du skye bar 'gyur//sems dmyal sems can bsad nas su//phyis kyang 'jigs pa de mthong ste//dpag tshad
407a4(mdo sde): brgyar ni yang dang yang //'jigs pa chen por ltung ba ro 'gyur//de dag sgo rnyed mi 'gyur te//phyis kyang mun par rab tu lhung //spu gri zhes bya sems dmyal du//
407a5(mdo sde): spu gri stong yang 'byung bar 'gyur//bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis//spu gA mdun du 'byung 'gyur to//bdug gis nyes pa'i las byas pas//de dag gis ni de lus
407a6(mdo sde): gtubs//rlung 'khrugs chen po mi bzad pas//lus de thams cad 'jog par byed//rtag tu 'di 'dra'i sems dmyal du//bdag gis sdug bsngal myong bar
407a7(mdo sde): 'gyur//lus ni rab tu sdug bsngal bar//sems can kun gyis bdag mthong ngo //khyim so bya phyir gzhan dag gi/nor yang rab tu bdag gis blangs//bdag
407b1(mdo sde): gis bu pho bu mo dang //de bzhin phu nu sring mo dang //bdag gi pha ma'ang de bzhin te//mdza' bo gnyen bshes mang po dang //bran dang las byed rnams dang ni//de bzhin pa dang
407b2(mdo sde): byugs dang g.yog/dgos pa ngan la bdag 'khrul te//gser dang dngul gyi snod rnams dang //de bzhin rab phra gos rnams dang //khyi mo byed bcug pas 'khrul pa ste//
407b3(mdo sde): khyim yang shin tu bkra byas nas//skyes pa bud med lang long dang //pi bang sil snyun 'khrol ba la//bdag yid ma dul dga' bar 'gyur//spos chu dag gis lus bkrus
407b4(mdo sde): kyang //nga dung byas pa gzo ba med//lus khyod sems pa med pa ste//nga ni khyod kyi ched la 'khrul//phyin chad sems can 'ga' tsam yang //bdag la skyob par 'gyur ba
407b5(mdo sde): med//rlung 'khrug chen po mi bzad par//lus ni yongs su gdung ba na//ro dang ldan pa zhim zos te//lces kyang sna tshogs de bzhin no//phreng ba sna tshogs bzang mdzes
407b6(mdo sde): pa//rab tu mang po mgo la bcings//mig ni gzugs kyis 'khrul byas te//mig gi skyabs ni yod ma yin//bdag gis mthong nas gang byas pa//sdig pa rnams ni
407b7(mdo sde): mig gi rgyu//lag pa rdo rjes bcang ba ni//bdag gi rna ba'i rgyu yin no//lag pa gnyis lo gdu bu btags//sor mo rnams la sor gdub bcug/mgul du mu tig se
408a1(mdo sde): mo do//rkang pa gnyis kyang rab tu brgyan//de la dra ba byas pa dang //de la gser yang gnas par byas//lus la rin chen sna tshogs dang //gser
408a2(mdo sde): gyi gdu bu'ang de bzhin no//longs spyod chen pos rab rtses nas//yid kyang shin tu rtas par gyur//rab tu 'jam lo bdag reg nas//shin tu sred pas de bstan to//
408a3(mdo sde): gding ba sna tshogs mal cha yis//bdag gis lus ni rtser bcug go/spos chu bzang pos khras byas te//spos rnams kyis kyang rab tu bskus//lha rdzas ga bur tsan+dan
408a4(mdo sde): gyi/bdug pa rnams kyis rab tu gdugs//kha dog bzang po byas nas kyang //gla rtsi ldan pas rab tu bsgos//lo lon 'bru mar dri dag dang //sna ma tsam+ba ka la
408a5(mdo sde): sogs//bskus nas phra mo ka shi ka/dkar po'i gos kyang rab tu bgos//glang po'i rgyab nas babs nas su//rta yi rgyab tu mngon par zhon//bdag ni rgyal po
408a6(mdo sde): yin snyam sems//skye bo bdag gi mdun na rgyug/glu gar shin tu bslabs pa yi//slas rnams kyang ni rab tu shes//ri dgas rnams ni ma nyes par//bdag
408a7(mdo sde): gis mdas kyang ri dag so bsad//'jig rten phyi ma ma shes pas//bdag gis 'di 'dre'i sdig byas shing //bdag gis gzhan gyi sha zos pas//de phyir bdag
408b1(mdo sde): gi sdug bsngal 'di//mi bzang 'ong bar 'gyur ba yi//'chi ba bdag gis ma shes te//bdag ni byis pa'i blor gyur pas//bdag gi lus kyang gso ba byas//deng ni bdag la
408b2(mdo sde): 'chi 'ong na//skyabs byed pa ni su yang med//gnyen rnams khyed cag thams cad kyang //nga yi gdong du bltar ci yod//ci zhig phyir ni gos 'dral zhing //ci phyir ngu zhing
408b3(mdo sde): smre sngags 'don//ci phyir skra rnams rab 'jig cing //ci phyir khrag kyang 'byin par byed//ci phyir mgo la rdul 'thor zhing //brang yang rab tu rdung bar byed//bdag
408b4(mdo sde): gson tshe na sdig pa rnams//spang bar bya rigs khyed ci mdud//bdag gi lus ni spyang ki dang //khyi dang bya rog rnams dang ni//bya rnams kyis kyang bza' bar 'gyur//
408b5(mdo sde): lus 'di dgos pa med par gsos//'chi ba'i sbrul dang ldan gyur nas//mi ni rtag tu skye bar 'gyur//'jigs pa 'di las grol 'gyur ba//de lta bu yi sman rnams
408b6(mdo sde): bsnyen//bdag la sman pas gang byin pa'i//sman de dgos pa ma yin na//nyon mongs sprul las thar byed pa//da ltar chos kyi sman rnams ni//'chi kar bdag la
408b7(mdo sde): sbyin par byos//shi ni nga la ma sbyin cig/lus 'di gso ba byas kyang ni//gdon mi za bar 'jig par 'gyur//gang phyir sdug bsngal sbyin gyur pa//sdig gi phung
409a1(mdo sde): po ci phyir blangs//lus 'dri shin tu gsos byas kyang //byas pa ma rung byed par 'gyur//bu dang bu mo ci zhig phyir//dA la mig gis blta bar byed//
409a2(mdo sde): na ba 'di las da skyobs shig/don med par ni ci phyir du//bro dang bu mo khyed cag da//de ni ma rung ma byed cig/khyed cag gso bar bya ba'i phyir//ngas ni gzhan gyi
409a3(mdo sde): nor yang phrogs//da ni 'chi dus bab pa na//ro thag chad kyis ci zhig byed//skye dang ngan 'gros rab tu 'jigs//'chi bas kyang ni yongs su gzir//tshor ba 'du
409a4(mdo sde): shes 'du byed dang //reg pa shin tu tshor ba'o//sred pas byis pa rnams kyang 'khyim//mi bzad 'bras bu rnams kyang thob//ngan pa'i rigs su skye ba ni//der
409a5(mdo sde): yang mya ngan bcings par 'gyur//bdag la bsod nams chung shes nas//skye bo gzhan dag mya ngan byed//sbyin dang tshul khrims yongs su nyams//chos la yang ni
409a6(mdo sde): rgyab kyis phyogs//yang skye ba ni mi shes pas//nyon mongs sbrul gyis nyon mongs pa//ma rig pas ni byis po rnams//gang na thar pa med par 'khyam//thar pa'i
409a7(mdo sde): don ni mi shes nas//'khrul pas sdig pa rnams kyang byed//nyon mongs rnams kyis byis pa 'khyam//yid ni rtag tu rnam par 'khrugs//bcing ba sna tshogs
409b1(mdo sde): ldan lus la//mes ni kun tu 'bar zhing tshig/gang na bde ba med pa der//lus ni rnam par 'khrul pas 'khyam//gang las shin tu bde 'byung ba//bde ba de ni mi shes te//
409b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zhing ni bde ba sbyin//chos kyi 'khor lo sman gyi mchog/tshul khrims bden pa'i tshul khrims so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshangs dbyangs yin//de nas bcom
409b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la bka' stsal pa/sman gyi sde sems can dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/de ltar smre sngags 'don kyang legs par
409b4(mdo sde): byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par de dag gi skyob par 'gyur ba su'ang med do zhes bka' de skad stsal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsungs so//sdig
409b5(mdo sde): pa'i las ni byas pas na//sems can dmyal ba rnams su lhung //sreg pa'i gos ni gyon par 'gyur//skom du lcags khu 'thung bar 'gyur//lus rnams la ni me mdag 'bab//
409b6(mdo sde): tshig nas rab tu mi bzad du//sems can dmyal ba 'jigs chen du//de yi lus ni rab tu 'tshig/bde ba dag ni mi shes shing //chos kyang rnam par mi shes te//chos
409b7(mdo sde): ma yin pas byis pa 'khyam//bde ba cung zad rnyed mi 'gyur//dad dang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs//shes rab ldan zhing dka' thub che//dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten
410a1(mdo sde): pa ni/de bzhin gshegs par myur du 'gyur//'jig rten sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i phyir//brtson 'grus kyi ni mchog rtsoms la//sems can thams
410a2(mdo sde): cad yongs bzung ba//dge ba'i las kyi chos ston cig/byams pa'i sems dang de bzhin du//tshangs spyod mchog la snyoms par zhugs//sman sde de skad thos nas kyang //
410a3(mdo sde): mchog tu bsgrub par 'gyur bar bya//rnam grol mthong dang sangs rgyas dang //sgra bsgrags rnam par 'dren pa dang //'jig rten gyi ni pha dang ma//de ni byang chub sems
410a4(mdo sde): shes bya//'jig rten du ni chos 'di gang ston pa//dge ba'i bshos gnyen mchog tu rab rnyed dka'//sangs rgyas bstan la gang dag gus nyan pa//de dag bla med sangs
410a5(mdo sde): rgyas bde gshegs 'gyur//zhi ba sangs rgyas sras rnams la//gang dag gus dang btsas 'gyur ba//de dag kyang ni sems can kun//thar byed 'jig rten mgon du
410a6(mdo sde): 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du dog sa 'di g.yo/
410a7(mdo sde): rab tu g.yo//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sman gyi sde
410b1(mdo sde): ci mthong ltos/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes bltas pa dang /phyogs bzhin sngags pa mthong ngo //sags pas sa gus pa'i phrag nas mi bye ba phrag
410b2(mdo sde): nyi shu byung ba dang /'og gi phyogs nas mi bye ba phrag nyi shu byung ba dang /snying gi phyogs nas mi bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga byung ba mthong ngo //de nas sems can gzhon nu de dag gis
410b3(mdo sde): rnam par bltas nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'dir su dag skyes/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyad cag skye bo'i
410b4(mdo sde): tshogs 'di dag la ltos/de dag gis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skye bo'i tsho gas 'di dag ni khyed la bde ba'i
410b5(mdo sde): phyir skyes so//gsol pa/sems can 'di dag kyang 'gum par 'gyur ram/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/grogs po dag de bzhin te/sems can thams cad
410b6(mdo sde): kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro//de nas sems can gzhon nu snga ma gang dag thog ma nyid du skyes pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom
410b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni yang skyo ba dang 'gum pa la blta bar mi spro'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'o na brtson
411a1(mdo sde): 'grus kyi stobs rnyed par spro 'am/de dag gis gsol pa/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du blta bar bgyi'o//de nas chos gang mnyan pa zhus te
411a2(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba mnyan par bgyi'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'dus pa la blta bar bgyi'o//byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba rnams la
411a3(mdo sde): blta bar bgyi ste/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu la spro'i skye ba dang 'gum pa la ni blta bar mi spro'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde rdzu 'phrul
411a4(mdo sde): gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya po de dag dang lhan cig tu stan las langs nas de dag thams cad rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi bar snang la 'gro zhing skyil mo krung bcas nas
411a5(mdo sde): bsam gtan byed de/de dag thams cad kyi lus las seng ge rnams byung ngo //stag rnams byung ngo //sbrul rnams byung ngo //glang po rnams byung ngo //rdzu 'phrul chen
411a6(mdo sde): po rnam par 'phrul pa ston to//ri la'ang skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod ngo //steng du dpag tshad nyi khri srid du 'gro'o//zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba stong phrag bcu'ang 'bab par byed do//
411a7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la sems can gzhon nu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'od zer chen po gda' ba dang /rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par
411b1(mdo sde): 'phrul pa 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khyed zla ba dang /nyi ma byung ba 'di la ltos/de dag gis
411b2(mdo sde): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi
411b3(mdo sde): lus las 'od zer snang ba dang /rdzu 'phrul dang /cho 'phrul bstan pa ste bstan nas kyang skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /
411b4(mdo sde): skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang /lha rnams dang /mi rnams kyi don dang /phan pa dang /bde ba'i phyir sems can rnams lo chos ston te/de dag 'dir mi'i lus dang /stobs dang
411b5(mdo sde): brtson 'grus bstan nas 'di 'dra ba'i stobs nye bar ston to//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'od zer snang ba 'byung bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos bstan du gsol/de skad ces gsol
411b6(mdo sde): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sman gyi sde khyod kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
411b7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so//des 'di snyam bsams
412a1(mdo sde): te/gang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la don de zhu'o snyam bsams pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sman gyi sde ci dang ci 'dod pa
412a2(mdo sde): dris shig dang /ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//bstan par bya'o//rnam par dbye bar bya'o//sman gyi sde gang 'das pa dang /ma
412a3(mdo sde): 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams kyi de thams cad bstan par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das the tsom bsal ba'i slad du bstan du gsol/bcom ldan
412a4(mdo sde): 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i bu stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis bskor ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhes bskor ba dang /klu'i rgyal
412a5(mdo sde): po bye ba stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis bskor ba dang /'byung po bye ba stong phrag bco brgyad kyis bskor ba dang /yi dgas dang sha za bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lngas bskor ba mthong
412a6(mdo sde): ngo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sman gyi sde sems can 'di dag ni chos nyan pa'i phyir 'khor 'dir nga'i gan du 'dus shing 'khod gor ma chag ste/sman gyi sde
412a7(mdo sde): 'di dag ni deng kho nar 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur ro//sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pas deng nyid sa bcu rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro//sa bcu la rab tu gnas
412b1(mdo sde): nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro//rga dang 'chi las thar bya'i phyir//las byas bde ba thob byed cing //nyon mongs zhags pa pham byas nas//spangs
412b2(mdo sde): rgyas bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi gnas mang po las sna tshogs kyis byung ba 'di ci'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das la bskor cing
412b3(mdo sde): gnas//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sman gyi sde nyon cig/sems can rmongs pa mi shes pa//thar bar 'gyur ba ga la yod//sems can gzhon nu mang po dag/
412b4(mdo sde): de ring gzugs rnams thob par 'gyur//sa bcu dag ni 'thob pa'i phyir//chos kun rab tu shes par 'gyur//sa bcu dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur//sangs rgyas bya ba byed par
412b5(mdo sde): 'gyur//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur//chos char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur//de ltar sems can 'dus pas na//nga yi bstan pa dga' ba'o//lha dang klu dang yi
412b6(mdo sde): dgas dang //lha min shin tu mi bzad pas//sa bcu la ni rab gnas te//chos kyi sgra yang sgrogs par 'gyur//chos kyi rnga yang brdung bar 'gyur//chos kyi dung yang rab tu
412b7(mdo sde): 'bud//sems can gzhon nu 'di dag kyang //brtson 'grus mthu dang ldan par 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pas thob pa bzhin//de dag deng ni chos thob 'gyur//de nas
413a1(mdo sde): sems can gzhon nu lnga stong tsam stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
413a2(mdo sde): gsol to//gang phyir mtha' ni ma 'tshal ba//'khor ba na ni 'chi ba ste//lus ni khur lci bcom ldan 'das//'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa//lam ni rnam par ma
413a3(mdo sde): 'tshal te//lam nyid kyang ni mi gda' bas//mgon po bdag cag ljongs gyur na//bdag cag rnams ni bsdu bar gsol//dpa' la bdag cag gsol ba 'tshal//
413a4(mdo sde): 'dren pas chos ni bshad du gsol//bdag cag shes rab chung ngur skyes//bde ba mngon par ma 'tshal to//bdag cag la ni chos bshad gsol//sdug bsngal mi
413a5(mdo sde): bzad grol bar mdzod//gang dang gang du skyes par yang //bdag cag sangs rgyas mthong gyur cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde sems
413a6(mdo sde): can gzhon nu rnams ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so//khyed cag rnams ni zas zo zhig/mang du byung ba'i ro yang 'thung //'jigs pa med par gyur
413a7(mdo sde): nas su//phyis gdod 'jigs med chos nyon cig/smras pa/btsun pa gnas brtan khyod su zhig/bdag cag rnams kyis khyod mi shes//khyod ni rab tu mdzes
413b1(mdo sde): par mthong //gzugs ni zhi zhing grags pa che//yi dgas 'jig rten 'jigs chen dang //sems dmyal dud 'gro rnams las thar//ji ltar 'gro ba mdzes pa bzhin//khyod
413b2(mdo sde): kyi sdig pa thams cad zhi//khyod kyi lag na snod yod pa//rin chen sna bdun ldan pa dang //lus lnga rin chen skyed bu dang //gzi brjid phung pos brgyan pa mthong //zhi ba khyod
413b3(mdo sde): kyis tshig smras pa//bdag cig lan 'debs mi nus so//bdag cig la ni zas rnams dang //zhim po'i skom yang mi dgos te//zas las bshang ba 'byung bar 'gyur//
413b4(mdo sde): de bzhin skom yang gcin du 'gyur//khu ba rnams las khrag tu 'gyur//de bzhin khrag las shar 'gyur bas//zas dang skom rab sbyar ba yang //bdag cag rnams la
413b5(mdo sde): dgos ma yin//dar dang snam bu sbyar ba dang //phra mo'i gos kyang dgos pa med//gser gyi gdu bu mi dgos te//mu tig phreng ba dgos ma yin//sor gdub dag kyang
413b6(mdo sde): mi dgos te//de kun mi rtag chos can no//bdag cag ngan par 'gro rnams su//'gro bar mi 'gyur srog 'tshol lo//lha rnams kyi ni bde ba dang //chos kyi sbyin pa
413b7(mdo sde): don du gnyer//dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dgos te//'khor los sgyur rgyal ma yin no//rab tu bzang ba'i gling bor nas//'khor los sgyur ba 'chi bar 'gyur//
414a1(mdo sde): bu yang phyi bzhin mi 'brang ste//chung ma bu mo rnams kyang min//rin chen sna bdun phyin las//phyi bzhin 'brang ba ma yin no//skye bo mang po bsdus pa
414a2(mdo sde): yang //phyi bzhin 'gro ba ma yin te//mdun du rgyug pa'ang ma yin no//de ltar phyin chad mi 'gyur ro//tshe gcig gis ni rgyal po las//mo rtag pas ni 'khyam
414a3(mdo sde): 'gyur te//sdig pa'i las rnams mang byas pas//de dag sems dmyal du 'bod ltung //rin chen sna bdun rdzu 'phrul ches//phyogs bzhi kun tu bskor ba las//
414a4(mdo sde): gang tshe ngu 'bod smin pa'i tshe//rdzu 'phrul de ni gang du song //sa gang dag na yod min pa//shi nas rdzu 'phrul byed mi nus//gnas brtan bdag cag rnams la gson//
414a5(mdo sde): gang na de bzhin gshegs par bzhud//pha dang ma ni ji lta bar//de ni mthong bar rab tu 'dong //bdag cag lo ni ma yang med//pha med phu nu rnams kyang med//'jig
414a6(mdo sde): rten gtso bo de bzhin gshegs//de nyid pha dang ma yin no//de nyid nyi ma zla ba ste//bde ba'i lam ni rab ston pa'o//gang phyir phyin chad mi skye bar//de ni 'khor ba thar
414a7(mdo sde): mdzad pa'o//nyon mongs chu bo 'jigs chen dang //chu bo sgrol ba'i glu de'o//de yis sems can rab bsgral te//phyin chad slar ni mi ldog go/byang chub mchog ni
414b1(mdo sde): rab ston pa//dam pa'i chos kyang des bshad do//bdag cag rnams la zas mi dgos//rgyal srid 'bras bu mi 'dod de//sems can dmyal bas 'jigs pa ni//lha yi
414b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'gro mi bya//mi yi tshe ni bde ba ste//de na thams cad mkhyen par snang //rang gi las ni nyes byas pas//tshe thung rnams ni 'khyam pa yin//de dag 'chi ba mi shes
414b3(mdo sde): kyi//'dod pa'i longs spyod rgyal srid shes//skye dang 'gag pas bslus pa rnams//shes pa med cing 'jigs pa med//mi rtag pas ni sems 'khrul rnams//phra ba'i
414b4(mdo sde): chos rnams mi shes te//phra ba'i dgos pa mi byed la//zhi ba'i dbyings kyang mi shes so//'chi 'pho la ni skyo med pa//yang dang yang du skye bar 'gyur//yun ring sdug
414b5(mdo sde): bsngal rab gzir cing //rtag tu dbyug pas brdegs byas nas//gzhan dag gi yang 'phrog byed de//de bzhin bcing zhing bsad pa byas//sngon gyi sdig pas bskul bas ni//de
414b6(mdo sde): dag bcing ba lngas bcings so//re thag kyang ni chad par 'gyur//mya ngan zug rngus zug par 'gyur//rnam par shes pa 'gag pa na//snying rje bar ni smre sngags 'don//bdag
414b7(mdo sde): gi skyob par su 'gyur la//gser dang dngul dang shel dag dang //longs spyod thams cad bdag gis dbul//bdag ni bran du'ang 'gyur bar bya//bran gyi tshul du gang gyur pa//
415a1(mdo sde): las rnams thams cad rab tu bya//rgyal srid longs spyod bdag mi dgos//nor dang 'bru yang ma yin no//rang gi lus ni bdag mi dgos//sdig pa
415a2(mdo sde): byed pa mi 'grol te//de ltar gnas brtan bdag cag la//bza' ba dogos pa ma yin no//gang dag kha zas zhim zos pa//rgyal po rnams kyang 'chi bar 'gyur//
415a3(mdo sde): dadung ba mchog ni 'thungs po yi//lha'i bu rnams kyang 'chi bar 'gyur//cho mtsho dgu ro ldan pa//zas dang skom ni rab bshams te//rgyal po'i mdun du blangs nas
415a4(mdo sde): su//kha zas la ni lces reg nas//rgyal po rnams ni ro la chags//sdig pa mi chung rnams kyang byed//gang la snying po med pa yi//mi rtag ro la chags par byed//
415a5(mdo sde): bdag cag rnams la skom mi dgos//bza' ba dag kyang dgos ma yin//bdag cag sdug bsngal gong grol ba//chos nyid de 'dra dgos ma yin//sred pa'i bcings
415a6(mdo sde): las rab grol zhing //sred pa'i nyon mongs rnam thar te//bcings pa kun las rab grol ba'i//sangs rgyas de la skyabs su dong //drang srong chen po 'jig mgon la/
415a7(mdo sde): bdag cag rnams ni skyabs su 'dong //sems can rnams kyis mthong dka' la//phyag 'tshal phyir ni bdag cag 'dong //khyod kyi mtshan ni ma 'tshal gyis//snyan pa'i
415b1(mdo sde): mtshan ni bstan du gsol//sman gyi sdes smras pa/khyed dang skye bo thams cad dang //de bzhin ming ni thos par 'dod//sems can gzhon nu bye ba phrag/stong gis de bzhin
415b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa bskor//de dag gis smras pa/khyod ni sangs rgyas nyan thos te//ming ni zab par grags pa yin//skye bo kun kyang de bzhin du//khyod kyi ming ni thos par
415b3(mdo sde): 'dod//smras pa/nga'i ming ni sman gyi sde//de ni sems can rnams kyi sman//sman rnams kun gyi dam pa ni//khyod cag rnams la bshad par bya//nad kun gyis btab
415b4(mdo sde): skye bo yi//nad rnams thams cad zhi bar byed//'dod chags nad ni nang po che//'jig rten 'jig byed mi bzad pa//gang gis blo med 'khyam pa yi//gti mug nad ni che
415b5(mdo sde): zhozhing drag/sems dmyal de bzhin dud 'gro dang //yi dgas rnams su sems can 'gro/byis pa 'di dag zhe sdang zin//de dag ji ltar zhi bar 'gyur//de dag gis smras pa//
415b6(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos ni 'di thos pas//bdag cag sdug bsngal kun las grol//byis pa blo ni mi shes pa//sdug bsngal kun las grol nas kyang //sdig pa'i las ni rnam spangs te//
415b7(mdo sde): bdag cag chos kyi sbyin pa nyan//sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs nas//'jigs pa mi bzad rnams kyang spangs//nad rnams thams cad zhi byed pa//sman pa'i rgyal po sman pa
416a1(mdo sde): ste/sdug bsngal ba rnams gso byed pa//yang dag sangs rgyas myur du blta//de bzhin gshegs la phyag bya phyir//gnas brtan khyod ni myur
416a2(mdo sde): du bzhud//phyag byas bdag cig rnams kyi tshig/'jig rten rnam par 'dren la gsungs//nad 'di rab tu zhi bar mdzad//lus ni thams cad rab 'bar te//che gi
416a3(mdo sde): cing zhi ba med pa yi//mi bzang me ni zhi bar mdzod//lus kyi khur ni khur po che//shin tu mi bzang rno ba'i khur//sdug bsngal gzir ba bdag cag la//brtul
416a4(mdo sde): zhugs dam pa thugs rje mdzod//skye bo rtag tu zhe sdang dang //gti mug non pa'i khur khyer te//khur las thar pa mi shes pa//de dag yang dang yang khur khyer//thar
416a5(mdo sde): pa'i lam ni mi shes shing //thar po'i lam ni ma mthong rnams//'chi ba rnam par shes mod kyi//'on kyang 'jigs pa mi skyed do//bdag cag la ni nam du yang //
416a6(mdo sde): 'chi ba med snyam bde bar gnas//kun tu 'khrul pas ma shi ba//mthong yang rnam par mi shes so//de dag pa yang mi dran te//nad kyis kyang ni rtag gzir cing //
416a7(mdo sde): nyon mongs las kyis rab dkrug na//ji ltar kha zas za bar 'gyur//sdug bsngal nyam thag mi shes te//bdag cag nga la ba don med do//khyod kyi sdug bsngal
416b1(mdo sde): 'di 'dra ba//ma rig gzhi las skyes pa'o//'du shes 'du byed tshor ba rnams//'jigs chen lci ba'i khur yin no//gang chos rnam par mi shes pa//byis pa sred pas rab tu
416b2(mdo sde): 'khyam//lus kyi khur gyis bskor ba ni//'jig rten du ni don med skyes//gos gtsang shin tu bzang ba dang //khrus dang byug pa dgos pa'o//lus lo gang yin 'ong ba yi//kha
416b3(mdo sde): zas zhim po dgos pa ste//yid 'ong ba yi sil snyan lnga//de bzhin rno bas tshor bar byed//rin chen bdun las byung ba yi//gzugs la mig gis chags par byed//zhim
416b4(mdo sde): pa'i ro rnams thams cad ni//lces kyang tshor bar byed pa ste//'jam zhing phra ba'i reg pa yang //lus kyis rtag tu tshor bar byed//lus kyis su ni sha gnyis po//dga' bar
416b5(mdo sde): yang ni bsgrubs pa las//sems pa med pa'i lus 'di skyes//de la dga' ba su zhig rnyed//de na bdag rkang dga' byed pa//lham ni rab tu bzang gyon yang //'chi bar
416b6(mdo sde): 'gyur tshe gos rnams dang //byug pa skyabs su mi 'gyur te//lus kyang skyabs su 'gyur min na//gos dang byug pa smos ci dgos//mi zhes bya ba lus yin te//dbugs
416b7(mdo sde): dang stobs che ni rnyed par 'gyur//so sor rtogs pa'i rna ba'i stobs//de ni lus la yon tan che//sngon chad rta dang gling po yis//kun tu bskor nas rtse zhing 'khyam//thar pa'i
417a1(mdo sde): chos ni ma ster bas//bdag ci sdig pa'i las la chags//'jig rten pha rol ma shes nas//rtse bas sdig pa byed du bcug/bdag ni yang dang yang
417a2(mdo sde): skyes te//shi ba bdag la yang 'ongs so//yang dang yang du mya ngan mthong //smre sngags 'don pas rab tu bcings//ma rnams kyang ni shi ba mthong //pha rnams shi
417a3(mdo sde): dong gnyen dag dang //sring mo dang ni bu dag dang //chung ma rnams kyang shi ba mthong //mngon par 'du byed kun stong na//sems dang bcas pa su zhig chags//'dod pas/
417a4(mdo sde): zin pa'i sems kyis su//bdag gis yid brtan rung bar shes//zhi ba'i chos ni mi dmigs te//'chi ba la ni mngon dga' med//de phyir 'dod pas bsgribs sems kyis//
417a5(mdo sde): bdag gis sbyin pa ma byin no//de bas 'dod dang mnyam sdig med//de ni da dung mi ldog go/kun tu nor pas bdag cag skyes//'gro ba mtha' dag kun tu nir//kun tu nor
417a6(mdo sde): pa'i sgra yang nyon//dam chos ma yin yongs su 'dzin//thar pa dang ni bsam gtan btsal//lus ni kun tu bkur mi bya//'jig rten don du 'gro ba'i gtso//sangs rgyas
417a7(mdo sde): ston pa rnams su shog/sangs rgyas 'jig rten pa dang ma//sangs rgyas lam ni rab ston pa//dzam+bu'i gling ni kun tu yang //rin chen char pa rab tu 'bebs//chos kyi
417b1(mdo sde): bsdu ba ci 'dra ba//sems can blun pos mi shes te//byang chub tu ni sems bsngos na//chos kyi bsdu ba thob par 'gyur//'du byed thams cad stong pa ste//de bzhin longs
417b2(mdo sde): spyod nor yang stong //bdag kyang stong par mthong bas na//mthong nas re ba med par gyur//gnas brten sman gyi sde khyed kyis//bdag cag rnams kyi tshig gson cig/byung
417b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir//khyod ni pho nyar bzhud 'tshal lo//'khor ba'i nyes pa rnams dran nas//byang chub sems dpa' skyo ba med//brtson 'grus ldan zhing
417b4(mdo sde): dka' thub che//yon tan kun tu sdud par byed//ston de ga la bzhugs par bzhud//ston pa bde bar rab sad nas//rgyal ba cung zad mi skyo bar//bdag cag slad du
417b5(mdo sde): zhu ba mdzod//khyod kyis bdud ni gzhom pa dang //stobs dang bcas pa pham par byas//sems can thams cad yongs 'dzin pa'i//chos kyang myur du 'bar bar byas//
417b6(mdo sde): gang gis sangs rgyas 'gyur ba yi//chos ni bdag cag ma thos kyis//bdag cag rnams la phan pa'i phyir//gnas brtan myur du bzhud du gsol//sum cu rtsa gnyis
417b7(mdo sde): mtshan mnga' ba'i//de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba//de srid bdag cag mi rgal zhes//thams cad gus dang bcas par gnas//sman gyi sdes smras pa/khyed cag
418a1(mdo sde): de ltar ci zhig mthong //re zhig gyen du blta bar byos//de dag gyen du bltas pa dang //khang pa brtsegs pa sum stong dang //lnga brgya tham par tshang
418a2(mdo sde): ba zhig/kun tu yang ni gnas par gyur//rin chen bdun gyis shin tu smras//rin chen dra bas legs par brgyan//dbus na me togra rab tu rgyas//lha rdzas spos kyang
418a3(mdo sde): rab tu 'bab//de na gnas brtan dris pa ni//khang brtsegs rin chen dra ba dang //pad+ma ze bar kun gnas par//'di na snang ba 'di ci zhig/sman gyi sdes smras pa/gnas
418a4(mdo sde): 'di dag ni khyed kyi ste//sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyir dengs shig/'jig rten 'das gtso gang yin pa//'jig rten snang byed de la 'thud//de dag gis smras pa/de yi lam
418a5(mdo sde): yang ma 'tshal te//de bzhin gshegs pa'ong ma mthong na//gang na lam yang ma 'tshal bas//phyag 'tshal du ni gang du mchi//sman gyi sdes smras pa/nam mkha'
418a6(mdo sde): mtha' yas ji bzhin du//reg par rung ba ma yin pas//bdud rtsi rab sbyin ston pa la//phyag 'tshal phyir ni 'gro mi nus//ji ltar ri rab gnas pa ltar//ston pa de
418a7(mdo sde): yang gnas na bzhugs//ri rab gzhal du rung ba yin//rgya mtsho chen po gting tshod zin//stong gsum rdul phran dpag tu rung //sangs rgyas 'byung ba shes ma yin//
418b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas//'jig rten snang bar mdzad la 'dud//smras pa/'jig rten mgon po bdag cag gzigs//bdag cag bsam pa rdzogs par mdzod//
418b2(mdo sde): bdag cag sems kyis ston pa la//phyag bgyis dri nas 'bras bu thob//sman gyi sngos smras pa/ston pa dri la mi chags te//phreng ba ma yin byug pa min//gang gis 'dus
418b3(mdo sde): byas grol 'gyur ba//sems can rnams kyi rgyu 'dzin to//gang gis yid ni btul byas shing //sangs rgyas la yang skyabs song ba//de la bdud ni mi bzad mchog/thab
418b4(mdo sde): mo rgol bar mi byed do//'chi ba'i dbang du mi 'gro yi//gzungs ni myur du rnyed par 'gyur//de sems rab tu dang byas nas//de nas ston pa mthong bar 'gyur//de nas bcom
418b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ka la ping+ka'i sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde stan las langs nas/bcom
418b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das gra la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer
418b7(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong byung ste/'od zer de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par gyur/sems can dmyal ba chen po sum
419a1(mdo sde): cu rtsa gnyis po thams cad kyang khyab par gyur/lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang snang bar gyur/'od zer de dag kyang kha dog sna tshogs sha stag la 'di lta ste/
419a2(mdo sde): sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang le brgan dang shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/'od zer de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung nas stong gsum gyi
419a3(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad bgyis nas slar log ste/bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba bgyis nas/bcom
419a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur pa'i 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gong lags/rkyen gang lags/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems
419a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
419a6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman
419a7(mdo sde): gyi sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sman gyi sde khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//gsol pa//
419b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sems can gzhon nu bye ba stong phrag sum cu byung ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos phra ba bstan pa rtogs nas sems can rgan po rnams la sems can rgan po
419b2(mdo sde): khyed rnams ni chos mi shes pa'o//rtag tu chos ma yin pa dang /mi dge ba la chags pa'o zhes phra mo rnams mi snyan pa mchi zhing yongs su brjod la gnod pa bgyid na/bcom
419b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das de ci'i slad du tshig snyan pa yid du 'ong ba 'di dag smras/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sman gyi sde de dag ci'i phyir tshig 'di skad smra ba mi shes sam/de dag ni de bzhin
419b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa la 'jam zhing shin tu snyan pa smra ste/chos kyang thos pas sman gyi sde de'i phyir de dge chos thams cad kyi don khong du chud par 'gyur/yon tan thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur//
419b5(mdo sde): de dag thams cad gzungs rtogs par 'gyur/deng phyin chad sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur/deng chos kyi rnga chen po'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur/deng chos chen po'i rnam pa dang ldan par
419b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//sman gyi sde khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so//bcom ldan
419b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sman gyi sde deng nyid sems can gzhon nu 'di dag khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gi nang du zhugs nas chos mngon par rtogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro//deng nyid
420a1(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro//deng chos kyi rnga chen po rdung bar 'gyur te/lha'i ris du ma zhig deng chos mngon par rtogs
420a2(mdo sde): bathob par byed par 'gyur ro//sems nan dmyal ba pa'i sems can log par ltung ba la gnas pa mang po dag kyang dri bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bstan pa thos nas 'khor
420a3(mdo sde): ba bsnyil to rgyal bar 'gyur ro//de'i tshe sems can rgan po bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu thams cad kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob ste/de dag thams cad kyang chos dang
420a4(mdo sde): ldan par 'gyur ro//sman gyi sde de dag thams cad ni sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su sbyangs par 'gyur ro//sman gyi sde de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong
420a5(mdo sde): bsgrub par 'gyur ro//sman gyi sde de dag thams cad ni tshis chen po'i sgra dang ldan par 'gyur ro//sman gyi sde phyogs bzhir ltos shig/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
420a6(mdo sde): chen po sman gyi sngas phyogs pa ni kun tu bltas pa dang /shar phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' grwang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed 'ong /lho phyogs nas byang chub sems
420a7(mdo sde): dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye bo phrag drug cu'i bye ma snyed 'ong /nub phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag bdun cu'i bye mo snyed 'ong /byang phyogs nas byang chub sems
420b1(mdo sde): dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'ong /'og gi phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bye ma snyed 'ong /steng gi phyogs nas byang chub sems
420b2(mdo sde): dpa' gang+gA'i gling bye ba phrag brgya'i bye mo snyed 'ong ste/de dag lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /bcom
420b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sdes 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' bar snang la gzugs nag po dang /gzugs
420b4(mdo sde): dmar po gda' ba ci zhig lags/bka' stsal pa/smin gyi sde gang bar snang la gzugs nag po dang /gzugs dmar po mthong ba 'di ci yin mi shes sam/de bzhin
420b5(mdo sde): gshegs pas ni mkhyen te sman gyi sde 'di ni bdud yin no//sman gyi sde mthong bar 'dod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lo//bde bar gshegs pa 'tshal
420b6(mdo sde): lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sman gyi sde byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma dang mnyam pa 'di lta bu lhags so//gsol pa/bcom
420b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag lhags pa'i rgyu gang legs/rkyen gang lags/bka' stsal pa/sman gyi sde sems can gzhon nu rnams kyi rkyen gyis te/de sems
421a1(mdo sde): can thams cad bsam gtan gyi chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro//sman gyi sde khyod kyis sems can gzugs sna tshogs 'dir lhags pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi
421a2(mdo sde): stobs kyis byin gyi rlabs sna tshogs 'di lhags pa dag mthong ngam/gsol pa/bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed dang /byang
421a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma snyed cig rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus gnas te/gzugs sna tshogs kha dag sna tshogs dbyibs sna tshogs pa dag gnas la/
421a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'phags pa'i chos kyi gnas la gnas te/byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor dang bcas nas chos kyi gnas la gnas pa mthong ngo //bcom
421a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu dpa' ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi sde dang /
421a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gsar rnying de dag kun dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /lha dang mi dang /lha mo yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/
421a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///'phags pa zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi
421b1(mdo sde): tra dang /dA na shI la dang /zhus chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/
421b2(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya tsin t+ya pra b+ha sa ni ra de sha nA ma d+har+m+ma paR+sha ya/bod skad du/'phags pa khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos
421b3(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal
421b4(mdo sde): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam dang /thabs
421b5(mdo sde): cig tu bzhugs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por gnas nas bzhugs te/rgyal po dang /blon po chen po dang /bram ze dang /khyim bdag
421b6(mdo sde): dang /gling rdal gyi mi dang /nang mi rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/btsun par byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyis bza' ba dang /bca'
421b7(mdo sde): ba dang /phyogs pa dang /myang ba bzang po mang po brnyes so//'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang
422a1(mdo sde): zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston
422a2(mdo sde): pasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rigs phun sum tshogs pa/gdung phun sum tshogs pa/cho rigs phun sum tshogs pa/tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa/ti
422a3(mdo sde): nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa/shes rab phun sum tshogs pa/rnam par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o zhes/
422a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa'i sgra dang /snun pa 'jig rten du rgya cher mngon du byung bar gyur to//bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha
422a5(mdo sde): lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyang ston te/tshangs par spyod pa/thog mar dge ba/bar du dge ba/tha mar
422a6(mdo sde): dge ba/don bzang po/tshig 'bru bzang po/ma 'dres pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/yongs su dag pa/yongs su byang ba/yang dag par rab tu ston to//spyan lnga dang
422a7(mdo sde): yang ldan te/sha'i spyan dang /lha'i spyan dang /chos kyi spyan dang /shes rab kyi spyan dang /sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan no//bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon mu stegs
422b1(mdo sde): can spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu dang /gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu rnams ni tshar bcad do//bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di lha dang mi rnams kyis yang dag par bzung zhing 'bar ro//
422b2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das snga ng+ge'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs mnabs te/lhung bzed bsdams nas dge slong gi tshogs dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /byang chub sems dpa'
422b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/mdun du gzigs pa dang /g.yas g.yon du gzigs pa mdzes pa dang /bskum pa dang /brkyang
422b4(mdo sde): ba mdzes pa dang /chos gos snam sbyar dang /bsil zan dang /na bza'i tshogs dang /lhung bzed bsnams pa mdzes pa dang /sku mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang /'od
422b5(mdo sde): 'dom grang bas mtshan mo mun pa mun nog gi nang na me'i phung po lta bu dang /tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya ba lta bu dang /nyi ma shar ba lta bur phyogs su snang zhing skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
422b6(mdo sde): curtsa gnyis dang ldan te/grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i them po la zhabs bzhag mo thag tu/de nas mnyan
422b7(mdo sde): yod kyi grong khyer chen por grong khyer du gshegs pa na/cho 'phrul ngo mtshar rmod du byung ba chos rnam pa 'di dag byung ste/skyes bu dam pa 'dren pa de gshegs pa'i tshe/der cho 'phrul
423a1(mdo sde): rmad du byung ba chen po gang dag byung ba de dag brjod par byas/shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis nyon cig/long ba rnams kyis ni mthong ngo //'on pa rnams
423a2(mdo sde): kyis ni thos so//gcer bu rnams kyis ni gos rnyed do//smon pa rnams kyis dran pa thob bo//grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad ni thal mo sbyar te/bde bar gshegs pa la phyag
423a3(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang 'khar rnga dang /sgra snyan dag ni ma brdungs par sgra 'byung ngo //ngang pa dang /ngur pa dang /khrung khrung dang /rma bya dang /ne tso dang /khu
423a4(mdo sde): byug dag kyang yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin to//gang dag gter stor ba de dag gis ni gter rnams rnyed par gyur to//gser dang dngul las byas pa'i snod rnams kyang ma dkrol
423a5(mdo sde): bar sgra byung ngo //sa'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing 'gul te/sems can rnams skyabs med par yang ma gyur cing /yid dang ba rab tu thob bo//smra ba'i mchog dam
423a6(mdo sde): pa sangs rgyas kyis gang dang gang du zhabs kyis gom pa bor ba de dang der pad+ma dri ma med cing /legs par gnas pa rnams byung ngo //dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems
423a7(mdo sde): can gang dag gis mthong ba de dag thams cad kyang bde ba rnyed nas mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro//bud med gang dag sbrum pa de dag kyang mi bde ba med pa nyid du gzugs bzang zhing /
423b1(mdo sde): lta na sdug pa dag bcas so//sems can rnams la'ang 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug rnams kyis gnod par gyur pa med do//rab tu sdang ba'i sems med
423b2(mdo sde): par phan tshun smra ste/dper na pha 'am ma zhig bu gcig pa la smra ba bzhin no//srang gi g.yas g.yon rnams kyang legs par brgyan par gyur to//nam mkha' la gnas pa'i
423b3(mdo sde): lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang me tog sil ma dag mngon par gtor to//sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa gang yang med do//sems can gang dag na bar gyur pa de dag
423b4(mdo sde): kyang nad med par gyur te/bde ba thob bo//bde bar gshegs pa gshegs pa na sems can so so nas de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag kho na la gzigs so snyam du sems so//
423b5(mdo sde): so so nas bdag nyid bsod snyoms 'bul zhing /mi'i 'dren pa la brten nas bdag kho na bsod snyoms kyi 'bras bu la sbyor ro snyam du sems te/de gshegs pa tsam yang gzhal
423b6(mdo sde): bar sla ba ma yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du mthar chags su bsod snyoms bzhes shing gshegs nas/bcom ldan 'das grong bar gyi dbus
423b7(mdo sde): zhig tu gshegs pa dang /de'i tshe khang stong zhig tu khye'u gzugs bzang ba/mdzes pa lha na sdug pa zhig bor bar gyur te/lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo khar bcug nas/'jig
424a1(mdo sde): cing 'dug pa la khyi 'am/ce spyang gang dag khang stong der lhags pa de dag kyang khye'u de la lce'i dbang pos bldags shing 'dong ste/'di ltar sngon byas pa'i
424a2(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa bas khye'u de la 'tshe ba mi byed do//khang stong der skye bo phal po che dag kyang 'jug cing 'byung ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che 'jug cing 'byung ba gzigs
424a3(mdo sde): nas mkhyen bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo gang du skye bo phal po che 'di dag 'jug cing 'byung po'i khang stod de ni ci yod ltos/de skad
424a4(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan to/khang stong ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /khye'u gzugs bzang ba/mdzes
424a5(mdo sde): pa/lta na sdug pa zhig lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo khar bcug ste/'jib cing 'dug la mig gnyis mi 'dzums par skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la lta ba mthong ngo //mthong
424a6(mdo sde): nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das ga lnga ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la skabs de gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das khung stong dri na khye'u bor ba
424a7(mdo sde): gzugs bzang ba/mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa/rin po che'i gzugs ltar mchis pa/mig mi 'dzum par skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la lte ba zhig mchis so//de
424b1(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kye ma khye'u 'di ni sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa ste/nga'i legs par bshad pa'i don shes par nus shing /skal ba can no snyam nas/khye'u
424b2(mdo sde): de la thugs brtse ba dang /skye bo phal po che dge ba la gzung pa'i phyir/khang stong ga la bder gshegs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das der gshegs nas phyogs gcig tu
424b3(mdo sde): bzhugs te/phyogs gcig tu bzhugs nas/khye'u de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa//sbrul dang gnod sbyin rgyu ba yis//dur khrod 'jigs pa tshe 'di na//byis
424b4(mdo sde): pa ji ltar mi 'jigs shing //khyod de gcig pu 'di ni 'dug/de nas khye'u des sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /rang gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas/bcom ldan 'das la slar tshigs
424b5(mdo sde): su bcad de gsol pa//bdag ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la//thub pa'i dbang phyug su zhig 'jigs//thams cad mkhyen pa smra ba'i mchog/ji ltar 'dir mchis las gang
424b6(mdo sde): lags//bdag gcig bdag gis gang ma mchis//bdag kyang gang gi'ang ma lags te//bdag ni su'i lags de ma mthong //bdag gi su lags de ma mthong //
424b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sngon cad sdig pa byas pa'i las//de yi rnam smin 'di 'dra ste//khang pa stong pa 'dir bor nas//sdug bsngal tshor ba myong ba yin/
425a1(mdo sde): khye'us gsol pa/gau ta ma khang stong snyam pa yi//'du shes nga dung mnga' ba blta//byang chub snying por khyod bzhugs nas//'du shes yongs
425a2(mdo sde): su ma mkhyen tam//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//ngas ni 'du shes yongs shes te//nga la 'du shes yod ma yin//khyod nyid la ni snying brtse bas//
425a3(mdo sde): khang pa stong pa 'dir 'ongs so//khye'us gsol pa//sems can dag ni bar 'gra' yang //gang tshe shin tu mi dmigs pa//de tshe thugs rje grang du byung //khyod
425a4(mdo sde): ni su la thugs brtse mdzad//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bdag med zhi ba stong pa nyid//sems can 'di dag mi shes te//de dag nyid la snying brtse phyir//
425a5(mdo sde): bsod nams spyad pa spyod pa yin//khye'us gsol pa/stong pa zhi bar thugs chud nas//zhi ba stong pa nyid mkhyen kyang //de bzhin gshegs pa da dung du//phyin
425a6(mdo sde): ci log kyang ma spongs som//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/zhi ba stong pa nyid rtogs nas//sems can yongs su smin bya'i phyir//'dren pa chos
425a7(mdo sde): ston mdzad pa 'di//sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje yin//khye'us gsol pa/de bzhin gshegs pa da dung du//khyod kyis phyin ci log ma spangs//sems
425b1(mdo sde): can 'du shes ma mchis na//thugs rje gang du skye bar 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byang chub sems ni rab bzung nas//yod min sems can
425b2(mdo sde): rnams la yang //mi mchog rnams ni go gyon po//rang byung rnams kyi byin brlabs so//khye'us gsol pa/dngos po gang na mi dmigs pas//go cha thams cad
425b3(mdo sde): brdzun pa lags//dngos po ma mchis chos rnams lnga//go chu dmyigs pa ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos rnams dngos po yod min
425b4(mdo sde): yang //srog chags rnams la chos ston 'dri//'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyi//thugs rjes rnam par rol pa yin//khye'us gsol pa/chos ni yi ge ma mchis
425b5(mdo sde): na//bshad pa gud na ga la mchis//'jig rten rnams la slu mdzad dam//chos ma lags pa chos bshad dam//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//nga ni
425b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten sku ma yin//chos ma yin pa nga mi smra//phyin ci logs gyur sems can gyi//nyon mongs sel bar de byed do//khye'us gsol pa/nyon mongs rtsa ba ma
425b7(mdo sde): mchis te//nang ngam phyi rol rnams na yang //de dag rnams kyi gnas ma mchis//nyon mongs ji ltar rnam por sbyang //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
426a1(mdo sde): phyin ci log las byung ba rnams//yongs su brtags lngas skyes pa ste//rtog pa thams ca smang ba'i phyir//skrag chags rnams la chos ston
426a2(mdo sde): to//khye'us gsol pa/rnam brtag mang po ci 'tshul te//sems ni rang bzhin 'odadi gsal zhing //de la nyon mongs mi 'byung ste//nam yang nyon mongs de mi
426a3(mdo sde): 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te//sems ni rtag tu 'od gsal kyang //glo bur nye bu'i nyon mongs kyis//so so'i
426a4(mdo sde): spyi bo nyon mongs 'gyur//khye'us gsol pa/nyon mongs dmigs su ma mchis te//de dag phyogs na mi gnas na//glo bur du ni ji ltar 'gyur//de zhus bdag
426a5(mdo sde): lo bshad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//dper na sprin rnams bar snang lo//snang yang de dag de bzhin min//nyon mongs 'byung ba'ang de 'dra
426a6(mdo sde): ste/snang yang de dag de bzhin min//khye'us gsol pa/ma nor de bzhin gang lags pa//chos gnas nyid de chos nyid do//mnor de bzhin nyid chos la/nor
426a7(mdo sde): ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//byis pa 'du shes ldan rnams kyi//leg par rnam par gang brtags pa//blo de rtogs
426b1(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir//de bzhin gshegs rnams 'byung ba yin//khye'us gsol pa/skye ma mchis pas rab phye ba//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang zhig byung //skye ba ma mchis
426b2(mdo sde): chos rnams la//sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'thad ma lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//skye ba med par skye ba ni//sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab tu bstan//kun
426b3(mdo sde): rdzob tha snyad btags pa ste//dam pa'i don du yod ma yin//khye'us gsol pa/da dung khyod la don dam dang //kun rdzob 'du shes gnyis mnga' ste//theg pa gcig lam
426b4(mdo sde): 'gal 'gyur ba//gau ta ma khyod kyis bka' stsal to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po//nga ni lam dang 'gal mi byed//'gal ba med par nga gnas te//mi mthun
426b5(mdo sde): sems can sdums kyang byed//khye'u khyod de ltar shes par gyis//khye'us gsol pa/sems can de ni mi dmigs na//gau ta ma khyod ci sdums mdzad//chos rnams
426b6(mdo sde): sngon gyi mtha' la gzig so//gang gi kun nas nyon mongs skye//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi mtha' dang //de bzhin da ltar byung ba dang //byang
426b7(mdo sde): chub dam pa rtogs gyur nas//srog chags rnams la chos ston to//khye'us gsol pa/rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes sgrogs mdzad cing //nyid kyi mkhyen pa sgrogs mdzad de//
427a1(mdo sde): 'di ltar bdag tu sgro 'dogs pas//khyod ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal che//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nga ni bdag la mi bstod de//de bzhin
427a2(mdo sde): gzhan la brnyas mi byed//de bzhin nyid ni rab tu ston//des na de bzhin gshegs zhes bya//khye'us gsol pa/brjod du ma mchis de bzhin nyid//de na de nyid
427a3(mdo sde): ma mchis na//sgra skad ma mchis sgra bshad pa//mkhyen bzhin log par bka' ma stsal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//chos de thams cang log pa
427a4(mdo sde): ste//de bzhin nyid las byung ba yin//de bzhin nyid ni rtogs pas na//nga la skyon med yon tan med//khye'us gsol pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yis
427a5(mdo sde): na/bdag gi spobs pa 'di skyes te//'di 'dra'i lan dag gang gsol pa//rdzogs sangs rgyas la bzod par gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa
427a6(mdo sde): gser gyi kha dog can cho sa gos kyi nang nas phyung ste/khye'u de logs su brkyang ba dang /de nas khye'u des bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi sdor mo le bzung ste langs so//de
427a7(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de khang stong nas bsnams te/srang du bzhag pa dang /de na skye bo phal po che dag 'di ltar khye'u 'di 'di kho na ltar nyon mongs par gyur kyang //
427b1(mdo sde): bdag nyid chen po'i chos 'di lta bu'i lan 'debs pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ngo mtshar to snyam nas/ngo mtshar du gyur te/bcom ldan 'das la rab tu phyag 'tshal
427b2(mdo sde): lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/khye'u khyod kyi las kyi sgrib pa zad kyis/sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dran par gyis la skye bo'i tshogs chen
427b3(mdo sde): po la'ang shes par gyis te/rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston cig/de nas khye'u de sa las mi bdun srid tsam du 'phags nas lus las 'od phyung ste/'od des mnyan yod
427b4(mdo sde): thams cad dang /dzam+bu'i gling thams cad snang ba chen po rgyas par gyur to//'od des brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang /de ma yin pa lha brgya stong
427b5(mdo sde): mang po gzhan dag la'ang yang dag par bskul bar gyur nas/skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi
427b6(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/lha'i me tog dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas/bcom ldan 'das kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni snang ba bsam gyis mi
427b7(mdo sde): khyab pa ste/'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'od kyis snang bar bgyis nas/sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag gis don bgyis so zhes ched du brjod pa de skad ched du brjod de//
428a1(mdo sde): nga ba sa sa sa rgyas ma byu sa sa/ma ldan sa sa
428a2(mdo sde): makyis margya ma pa ba / sa rnas m-i ba yang nga //de nas m+be hU~M babs pa kyi mi khyab pa par skyeng du la pabs te/
428a3(mdo sde): jug/de nas ng+ge'i dbang pa 'di la lta sa brgyas pa rgya sbyin te/de nga maud / phyir ras bces 'a sbyin la gin
428a4(mdo sde): /rdo seM khyi ltung babs po sa mi khyab pas kyi byung po sbyin la 'di smad ces smras s+ho//TI/byung chub sems dpa' rnams ni gos kyi rgyun pani
428a5(mdo sde): bas medzes pa ma yin gyi/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos ldan thogs ni mangs so//kaushi ka lta mang kyi sngon kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i tshe
428a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi gas kyi rgyan gang nga/yon ze dngag nyon no//byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyigs kyi na/byang chub kyi snying mo brgyan par 'gyur du/
428b1(mdo sde): ngo tsha shes pa dang /khrel yod pa'i rgyun ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyun te/sems can thams cad mngon du 'dzin par 'gyur ro//dam bcas pa brtan pa ni byang
428b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyun te/shes rab yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//bsam pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyun te/sgyu dang g.yo sel bar
428b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//sbyor ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//lhag pa'i bsam pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
428b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/thams cad las khyad par 'gro bar 'gyur ro//nga rgyal med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
428b5(mdo sde): ro//chos don du gnyer ba dang /chos 'dod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/shes rab yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa
428b6(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/chags pa med pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//nor thams cad yongs su gtong ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
428b7(mdo sde): kyi gos kyi rgyan te/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/smon lam
429a1(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//bzod pa dang nges pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro dang sgra skad lta bu'i tshig
429a2(mdo sde): tu 'gyur ro//dam bcas pa brtan zhing sems mi zhum pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/bya ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//bsam
429a3(mdo sde): gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/mngon par shes pa chen po'i
429a4(mdo sde): ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa'i shes rab ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/bag la nyal dang lta bar smra ba dang /
429a5(mdo sde): kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro//snying rje chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo bar 'gyur ro//
429a6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/bdag dang gzhan gyi don la skyob med par 'gyur ro//zang
429a7(mdo sde): zing med par chos ston pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/shes rab kyis bdag dang gzhan sgrol bar 'gyur ro//chos sgrub pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
429b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi gos kyi rgyan te/nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rgyan 'di lta bu dag dang ldan pa de nam
429b2(mdo sde): yang gcer bu ma yin par rig par bya'o//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khye'u de la shin tu dga' ba dang dad pa skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
429b3(mdo sde): bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis ras bcos bu'i zung 'di len du stsal bar gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'di
429b4(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to//khye'u ras bcos bu'i zung 'di long la gyon cig/de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcom ldan 'das ga li ba der dong ste/pus mo g.yas
429b5(mdo sde): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ras bcos pu'i zung blangs nas bgos so//de nas
429b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la gshegs so//de na skyes pa dang bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo dang /tshong dpon dang /bram ze dang /
429b7(mdo sde): khyim bdag dang /rgyal po dang /blon po chen po dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa lo blta ba dang /bcom ldan 'das la'ang blta ba dang /phyag
430a1(mdo sde): bya ba dang /mchod pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis bsod snyoms bzhes te/khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab
430a2(mdo sde): pa'i ma'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs so//gshegs nas kyang cang mi gsung bar phyogs gcig tu bzhugs so//de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ma ngo tsha nas//
430a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir skor ma byung ngo //de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rang gi khyim du song nas/ma li tshigs su bcad de spros pa//bdag
430a4(mdo sde): gi sngon gyi nongs pa yis//khyod kyi mngal du bdag mchis te//yum gyis nongs pa ma logs gyis//'o ltar gnong bar ma mdzad cig/thugs brtse ldan te bskyed
430a5(mdo sde): pas na//bdag gi sbyin gnas khyod lags so//zhal che ma mdzad ma 'dzem par//de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du bzhud//de ltar khyod mngal bdag mchis pa//
430a6(mdo sde): khyod kyis brnyes pa legs par brnyes/lus kyi dge ba'i las rnams kyang //rnam par 'dren la zhu ba mdzod//de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas/lha'i
430a7(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//kau shi ka lha'i me tog man+da ra ba dag dang /lha'i spos dag dang /lha'i gos dag bdag la stsol cig/de dag bdag gis
430b1(mdo sde): skyed pa'i ma 'di la stsol to//'dis de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyis nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro//de
430b2(mdo sde): nos lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/khye'u de la lha'i me tog man+da ra ba dag dang /lha'i spos dag dang /lha'i gos dag byin no//de nas khye'u snang ba bas mo gyis mi khyab pas ma la
430b3(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad de smras pa//yum cig lha yi me tog man+da re//lha sdug mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba dang //spos dang na bza' 'di dag blang mdzod la//mi mchog sangs rgyas
430b4(mdo sde): de la dbul ba mdzod//'jig rten dgun pa ma zas skom dang //nor dang gos kyis mchod pa mchod ma lags//gzhan du gang dag chos la sbyor bgyid pa//des na de dag
430b5(mdo sde): mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur//rkang gnyis dam pa de la mchod mdzod la//byang chub mchog tu smon lam brtan par mdzod//bdag ni dus duso khyod kyi drung mchis te//yun
430b6(mdo sde): ring dus nas skul ba bgyid pa lags//gnong zhing zhum pa'i sems su ma mdzad par//rangs pa'i sems dang dga' ba thob mdzod la//rang byung rgyal ba bzhugs pa der
430b7(mdo sde): bzhud de//skyes bu mchog gis zhabs la phyag mdzod la//mgon po de la me tog spos rnams dang //de bzhin na bza' rnams kyang gtor nas su//rgyal ba de las dge
431a1(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa bskyed de//byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed pa mdzod//byang chub mchog tu sems ni brtan gyur nas//gang dag dang bas rgyal la gus
431a2(mdo sde): bgyis pa//de dag rnam smin 'jig mgon bka' stsal ces//rang byung rgyal ba de la zhu ba mdzod//le'u dang tshigs su bcad pa/de nas bud med de bcom ldan
431a3(mdo sde): 'dras ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/zhu ba ji skad bstan pa
431a4(mdo sde): bzhin du gus pa dang btsas par yongs su zhus so//zhu ba zhus pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs pa 'dis//ngan 'gro 'am
431a5(mdo sde): mi khom 'gro mi 'gyur//sangs rgyas bye mang mnyes byas nas//mi yi dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du bsod
431a6(mdo sde): snyoms bzhes nas/khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /skye bo phal po che gzhon dag dang yang thabs cig tu grong khyer nas byung ste/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshel
431a7(mdo sde): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der gshegs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zas kyi bya ba mdzad do/nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas
431b1(mdo sde): chos nyan du gzhug pa'i phyir bzhugs so//de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba dang /
431b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/yul
431b3(mdo sde): ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnam pa de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i
431b4(mdo sde): khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de ga la mchis/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan nas mthong ste/rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis
431b5(mdo sde): khye'u de'i lus gzugs yongs su grub pa lha las 'das pa'i mdog dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab kyis brgyan pa mthong
431b6(mdo sde): nas 'di snyam du sems te/sngon las byas shing bsags pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'di ltar 'di'i lus yongs su dag par gyur snyam mo//de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab
431b7(mdo sde): pas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /rang gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa//gang dag rtag
432a1(mdo sde): tu byams sems dag sems ldan//gang dag mi brlang mnyen zhing dran ldan la//legs par bsdams shing drang la tshangs spyod pa//de dag lus ni rnam
432a2(mdo sde): par dag par 'gyur//gang dag sdig pa spong zhing mi spyod la//rtag tu dge ba mi chung rnam spel zhing //gnod par sems dang khro ba rnam spong ba//de dag lus ni rnam par
432a3(mdo sde): dag par 'gyur//gang dag sangs rgyas chos dang tsho gas mchog la//gus dang bcas par rtag tu mchod byed cing //gzhan la rdeg 'tshog sdigs mo mi byed pa//de dag
432a4(mdo sde): lus ni rnam par dag par 'gyur//gang dag gzhan la phrag dog ser sna dang //de bzhin nga rgyal dag kyang mi byed la//gzhan gyi nyes pa byung ba mi brjod pa//de dag lus
432a5(mdo sde): ni rnam par dag par 'gyur//gzhan la gtso dri ba dang smad pa dang //ba shung ba dag ni nam yang mi byed cing //gzhan la 'khrul pa'i glags lta mi byed pa//de dag lus ni
432a6(mdo sde): rnam par dag par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das li rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di
432a7(mdo sde): chos chen po dang ldan pa lags na/bcom ldan 'das las kyi sgrib pa gang zhig gis/khye'u 'di bud mod khyim thab ma mchis pa'i mngal du skyes la/der yang khang
432b1(mdo sde): stong bu bor bar gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/'di nas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na/de'i tshe de'i dus
432b2(mdo sde): noni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu
432b3(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //rgyal po chen po de'i
432b4(mdo sde): tshe de'i dus na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de'i gsung rab la byang chub sems dpa' gnyis shig byung ste/lha bzang zhes bya ba dang /sa
432b5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni phyir mi ldog par gyur cing /don nyung ba/bya ba nyung ba/dben pa la dga' ba/ bsam
432b6(mdo sde): gtan dang /mngon por shes pas rnam par rtsa bar gyur to//de la byang chub sems dpa' sa zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni chos rgya chen po dang ldan par ma gyur te/lha
432b7(mdo sde): bzang gi g.yog byed do//de ha cang grong dang /grong rdal dang /yul 'khor dang /pho brang 'khor dag tu 'jug ste/zhugs nas kyang bya ba mang zhing byed pa mang bar gyur nas/
433a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang des de la khyod ci'i phyir rnal 'byor dang spong ba la brtson par mi byed par ha cang bya ba mang zhing ha cang byed pa mang zhes bsgo zhing
433a2(mdo sde): bstan to//des de la yang dang yang bskul bas khros 'khrugs te yi ma rangs nas/gnod sems su gyur pa des lus dang sems ma rung bar byas te/ngan du bsems
433a3(mdo sde): nas tshig rtsub po smras pa/nul gyi bu/sbyar ma'i bu/skyes pa gzhan las grub pa khyod kyi pha ma'ang med na/khyod la shes rab bam/tshul khrims lta ga la
433a4(mdo sde): yod ces des ngani du bsams te/tshig rtsub po smras pa/mi mthol mi 'chags mi 'dor gyi/zhe la 'dzin te/de byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang de la rtag tu
433a5(mdo sde): ngan sems dang ldan zhing byams pa'i sems med par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' lha bzang gris kyang de snod ma yin no zhes nas bkye ba dang /de de bas kyang byang
433a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' lha bzong la ngan du sems shing bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod de/snyan pa ma yin pa dang /grags pa ma yin pa dang /tshigs su bcad pa mo yin
433a7(mdo sde): pa brjod do//de las bsags shing tshogs su byas pa des lus zhig ste/shi bi'i 'og tu bud med khyim thab med pa'i mngal du skyes so//byang chub kyi sems
433b1(mdo sde): bsrungs pas des na sems can dmyal bar ni ma skyes so//de btsas ma thag tu bud med des lam srang chen por bor te/der de khyi dang /spang ki dang /ce spyang rnams kyis
433b2(mdo sde): zos so//rgyal po chen po tshul 'di 'dra bar 'do bskal pa dgu bcur sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dang /nyam thag pa 'di lta bus 'chi ba'i dus byas shing btsas pa na 'ong bor bar gyur
433b3(mdo sde): te/yang skye bo phal po che 'di skad du nal gyi bu sbyar mi'i bu 'di la khyi dang spring ki dang /tse spyang rnams za'o zhes 'dzir to//rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na/byang chub sems
433b4(mdo sde): dpa' sa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin po snyam du khyod som nyi'am/yid gnyis zo bar gyur na rgyal po chen po khyod kyis de de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/khye'u
433b5(mdo sde): snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' sa zhes bya bar gyur to//rgyal po chen po 'di'i las kyi sgrib pa ni zad/kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems
433b6(mdo sde): ni rnam par sbyangs/de bzhin gshegs pa ni mnyes par byas/ngan 'gro thams cad ni bcad nas/khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa
433b7(mdo sde): bzhi mnyes por byas shing /bsti stang byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas nas/sangs rgyas bcom lnga ni 'das de dag gi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do//chos yongs
434a1(mdo sde): su btsal ba la'ang brtson par gyur to//rgyal po chen po de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag nyid chen po 'di thob bo//rgyal po chen po de ltar na las nag po
434a2(mdo sde): dang /dkar po drag chung za bar 'gyur ba med do//rgyal po chen po de lta bas na mkhas pas lus kyi las dang /ngag gi las dang /yid kyi las bsdams par bya ste/
434a3(mdo sde): srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub
434a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' lha bzang zhes bgyi bar gyur pa des/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob logs sam/'on te da dung du'ang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
434a5(mdo sde): spyod pa bgyid/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha bzang de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs
434a6(mdo sde): po'i sngangs rgyas kyi zhing na tshangs par spyad pa spyod de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal 'byung zhes bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po grasal
434a7(mdo sde): rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos gus par bgyis te/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen par bgyi'o//
434b1(mdo sde): bsten par bgyi'o//bsnyen bkur bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen cing bsten te/bsnyen bkur bgyis na dge ba'i chos
434b2(mdo sde): 'thob par 'gyur ro//dge ba'i chos thob pa'i bsam pa dag par 'gyur ro//bsam pa dge bas sbyor ba dge bar 'gyur ro//sbyor ba dge bas dge ba'i las bgyid par 'gyur
434b3(mdo sde): ro//las dge bas 'gro ba dge bar mchi bar 'gyur ro//'gro ba dag bas dge ba'i grogs po mgu bor bgyid do//grogs po dge bas sdig pa'i las mi bgyid do//bgyid
434b4(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ro//sdig pa ma bgyis shing dge ba'i las bgyis pas bdag la gdung bar mi 'gyur/gzhan la gdung bar mi 'gyur ro//bdag dang gzhan rjes su bsrung bas
434b5(mdo sde): byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi lam la gnas pas lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don bgyid nus pa dang /skal ba mchis pa
434b6(mdo sde): dang /mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po legs so legs so//khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras so//rgyal
434b7(mdo sde): po chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi chos nyid thams cad yangs su rdzogs par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan
435a1(mdo sde): 'das la khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na/myur du bla na
435a2(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /zab mo'i chos rnams la'ang bzod pa thob par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis
435a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/khye'u byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /zab
435a4(mdo sde): mo'i chos rnams la'ang bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa la 'jug pa dang /chad pa dang /rtag pa rnam par spong
435a5(mdo sde): ba dang /sems can med pa dang /srog med pa dang /gang zag med par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid la mos shing /stong pa nyid spyod yul ba ste/byang chub sems
435a6(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /zab mo'i chos rnams la'ang bzod pa
435a7(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur ro//khye'u gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
435b1(mdo sde): ste/bzhi gang zhe na/sngon gyi mtha' dben pa dang /phyi ma'i mtha' mi 'pho ba dang /da ltar byung ba 'jig par shes pa dang /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid de bzhi po de dag
435b2(mdo sde): go/gzhan yang bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/lus dben pa dang /sems dben pa dang /chos dben pa dang /las dben pa ste/bzhi po de dag go//gzhan yang
435b3(mdo sde): bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/sangs rgyas la chos nyid du mthong gi gzugs su ma yin pa dang /chos la 'dod chags dang bral bar mthong gi yi ge dang /nges pa'i tshig tu
435b4(mdo sde): ma yin pa dang /dge 'dun la 'dus ma byas su mthong gi tshogs su ma yin pa dang /shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/bzhi po de dag go/gzhan yang
435b5(mdo sde): bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/bsdu ba'i dngos po mi gtong bas pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /thabs shes pa la mkhas pa dang /sems can med
435b6(mdo sde): par rnam par dpyod pa dang snying rje chen po ste/khye'u byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
435b7(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya ba dang /zab mo'i chos rnams lo'ang bzod par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa bsgrub pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/khye'u snang ba bsam gyis
