436a1(mdo sde): mi khyab pa mi skye ba'i chos la bzod par thob par gyur te/de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis ta la bdun srid tsam du steng gi bar snang la mngon par
436a2(mdo sde): 'phags par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/
436a3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog sna tshogs/kha dog du ma byung ba 'di lta ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /
436a4(mdo sde): le ba rgan dang /dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste/kha dog du ma de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bar byas te/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon
436a5(mdo sde): par byung nas/zla ba dang nyi ma rnams kyi 'od mog mog por byas te/slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan
436a6(mdo sde): las langs te/bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/
436a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis don de zhus pa/lha sdug bltar 'os gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang //dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis rab mdzes
436b1(mdo sde): shing /'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'od kyis 'od mdzad pa//'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol//tshul khrims 'phags shing spyod pa legs spyad pa//ting 'dzin
436b2(mdo sde): shes rab bsags pa'i ye shes 'od//rnam grol snying po stobs ldan yang dag gzigs//'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol//bzod pa'i stobs ldan stobs kyi
436b3(mdo sde): shugs mnga' ba//brtson 'grus mngon par 'phags te mi bstod pa//mig tu sdug cing bden pa bzhi gzigs pa//'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol//rdo/
436b4(mdo sde): rje'i sku mnga' sra brtan mi shigs pa//sred med bu mthu sred med bu bas mchog/tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan 'jam pa'i dbyangs ldan pa//'dzum pa mdzad de bdag la bstan du
436b5(mdo sde): gsol//bzhugs kyang tshangs dang de bzhin lha tshogs kyis//de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug ma mthong la//gus dang bcas pas kun nas blta bgyid pa//'dzum pa
436b6(mdo sde): mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol//khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor//mi rtag sgras ni lha dang lha min dang //de bzhin klu dang gnod sbyin rab bskyod pa//'dzum pa
436b7(mdo sde): mdzad de bdag la bstan du gsol//snang ba mnyes shing mun pa rnams bral ba//kun nas spyan mnga' mnyam pa nyid bzhugs pa//yon tan mchog mnga' yon tan snying po
437a1(mdo sde): bstan/'dzum pa mdzad de bdag lnga bstan du gsol//de skad ces gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad
437a2(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa shing ta la bdun srid kyi steng gi bar snang la 'dug pa 'di mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan
437a3(mdo sde): 'das mthong lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bskal pa
437a4(mdo sde): grangs med par rgya'i 'og tu bskal pa kun tu snang byed ces bya ba la/'jig rten gyi khrims rnam par sbyong zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
437a5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen po/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha drang mi
437a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba nyid du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams
437a7(mdo sde): rnam par sbyong ba de ni 'di lta bur yongs su dag par 'gyur te/dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang /yongs su spyod pa lta bur 'gyur ro///
437b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de ni bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas par 'gyur ro//de la nyan thos brgyad khri'i dge 'dun yod par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong
437b2(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun yod par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de rnam par spyod pa zhes bya zhing /bskal pa kun tu snang byed ces bya bar 'gyur zhe na/kun dga'
437b3(mdo sde): bo bar gyi bskal pa brgya stong mang por sangs rgyas kyi zhing dor sngon nam yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi byung ste/der de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de 'byung bar
437b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de na/gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha rnams 'di skad du bskal pa 'di ni kun tu snang ba med pa kun tu snang ba med pa ste/de la de bzhin gshegs pa byung ngo zhes ched du brjod
437b5(mdo sde): pa ched du brjod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//byang chub sems dpa' snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa lung bstan pa brjod pa 'di bshad pa dang /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na//
437b6(mdo sde): lha dang mi'i srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so//byang chub sems dpa' drug cu ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par
437b7(mdo sde): gyur to//nyan thos lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kuno dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun
438a1(mdo sde): dga' bo khyod kyi nga'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang /da ltar dang /ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir chos kyi
438a2(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di gzung zhig/kun dga' bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags na/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci
438a3(mdo sde): legs/'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di las kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba dang /sangs rgyas rnam par rol
438a4(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba dang /snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa zhes bya bar gzung zhig/kun dga' bo gang la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa
438a5(mdo sde): bzhugs pa la bsti stang byed/bla mar byed/ri mor byed/mchod pa byed cing /me tog gi phur ma ri rab tsam gtor ba dang /spos dang /phye ma dang /byug
438a6(mdo sde): pa dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /lha'i dang mi'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gis mchod pa bas/rigs kyi bu
438a7(mdo sde): 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing klog la/kun chub par byed cing /gzhan dag la'ang
438b1(mdo sde): rgya cher yang dag par ston la/de bzhin du nan tan du byed na 'di ni bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ches mang du bskyed do//kun dga' bo de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa chos
438b2(mdo sde): kye mchod pas mchod par 'dod pa dang /shes rab kyi snang ba chen po byed par 'dod pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/klag par bya/nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya/gzhan
438b3(mdo sde): dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /byang chub sems dpa'
438b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /mo mjed kyi bdag po
438b5(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/
438b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bstan pa zhes bya ba chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so///
438b7(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ran+d+ra bo d+hi dang /zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya ta thA ga tA nA ma bud+d+ha k+She tra gu Nok+tad+harma paR+YA
439a1(mdo sde): ya/bod skad du/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs/sangs rgyas
439a2(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das yul mnyam dka' na chos kyi dgon pa
439a3(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying po na nor bu rdo rjes spras pa'i pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag
439a4(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang thabs cig go//de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dus pa
439a5(mdo sde): de nyid du byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur to 'dug go//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
439a6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las langs te/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la smras pa/kye rgyal
439a7(mdo sde): ba'i sras dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde
439b1(mdo sde): ba can gyi nyin zhag gcig go/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i spangs
439b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba'i nyin zhag gcig go/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba'i bskal pa de ni
439b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje snying pos rab tu 'dul ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyi nyin zhag gcig go//kye
439b4(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyi bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rnam par gdon mi za bar pad+mo rab tu rgyas
439b5(mdo sde): pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dbyangs kyi nyin zhag gcig go/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams phyir mi ldog pa'i
439b6(mdo sde): 'khor lo dbyangs kyi bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i nyin zhag gcig go/kye rgyal
439b7(mdo sde): ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mar
440a1(mdo sde): me ldan gyi nyin zhag gcig go/k+She rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams mar me ldan gyi bskul pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
440a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po'i nyin zhag gcig go/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi
440a3(mdo sde): khams 'od bzang po'i bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od zer rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams
440a4(mdo sde): 'da' bar dka' ba'i nyin zhag gcig go/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' bar dka' ba'i bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
440a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa mngon par shes pa thams cad blo gros 'od zer rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyan gyi nyin zhag gcig go//kye
440a6(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyan gyi bskal pa de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i thugs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
440a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams me long gi dkyil 'khor dbyangs kyi nyon zhag gcig go//kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gang 'jig rten gyi khams brtag cing bgrang ba la 'jug
440b1(mdo sde): pa'i tshul 'dis sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phyag bcur tshang ba'i rdul phra rab snyed 'das pa'i pha rol na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
440b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal bzang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grang na byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i sa yongs su spyod pa'i khyad par can 'jig
440b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams pad+mo dpal gyi nyin zhag gcig go//kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
440b4(mdo sde): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/'dzin tam/klog gam/kun chub par byed dam/gzhan dag la'ang
440b5(mdo sde): rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rab 'byams ngag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
440b6(mdo sde): 'das rnams de'i mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du skye ba dran
440b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
441a1(mdo sde): chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po dga' zhing de skad ces smras so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gyi
441a2(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal pos smras pa la mngon par bstod do///
441a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa de bzhin gshogs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so///
441a4(mdo sde): 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs theg pa chen po'i mdo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan
441a5(mdo sde): 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshol mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
441a6(mdo sde): chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nu ma mkha' lding dang /mi 'am
441a7(mdo sde): ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang /mi ma yin pa du mas yongs su bskor te/mdun gyi bltas nas chos ston to//de'i tshe byang chub sems
441b1(mdo sde): dpa' seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa zhes bya ba zhig 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de mthong nas ltad mor gyur te/de
441b2(mdo sde): stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la bA de logs su thal mo sbyar
441b3(mdo sde): ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas 'byung ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma zhig 'das
441b4(mdo sde): na gang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang bcom ldan 'das kyi ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar ma gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das bdag gi zhu ba bstan pa 'di'i lan stsal
441b5(mdo sde): du gsol/byang chub sems dpa' gzhan drag gis thos na'ang dbugs phyin par 'gyur lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan
441b6(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor yang dag par gzengs bstod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sring ge'i rgyal po bkod pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu nyon
441b7(mdo sde): cig dang /dris pa lan gdab pa dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang ngas sngon so so'i skye bo'i dus na kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te lan
442a1(mdo sde): mang du byas pa de bstan par bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
442a2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas spang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//de'i dus na khyim bdag drag shul cen
442a3(mdo sde): gyis byin zhes bya ba zhig shin tu ma dad cing yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos lnga dang ldan zhing /chos 'dul ba la rgyab kyis phyogs so//dge slong rnam par rgyal ba
442a4(mdo sde): 'byung ba zhes bya ba zhig khyim bdag de la snying brtse ba'i phyir yang dang yang du rgyun mi 'chad par khyim bdog de'i khyim du 'gro'o//re zhig na dus kyi mthus
442a5(mdo sde): khyim bdag de dge slong de la rjes su chags pa dang bcas pa'i sems su gyur nas/re zhig nu khyim bdag des legs par bya ba'i las kyi 'bras bu
442a6(mdo sde): dros so//de nas dge slong des skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir dang /'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang //
442a7(mdo sde): lha dang /mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang /phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir khyim bdag de la dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
442b1(mdo sde): ston te/khyim bdag dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o//des 'khor phun sum
442b2(mdo sde): tshogs pa thob par 'gyur te/gang dang gang du smos par chos dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/'khor mang po dang lus phun
442b3(mdo sde): sum tshogs nas gzugs bzang po nyid thob par 'gyur/yo byad phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur te/btsal mi dgos par yo byad rnams 'byor
442b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur/lus sra zhing brtan la lus phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing /de la ri dang brtsig pa rnams kyang sgrib pa mi byed de/phun sum
442b5(mdo sde): tshogs pa bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro//de nas khyim bdag de dga' zhing mgu la yi rang bar gyur nas/dge slong de'i rkang pa la phyag byas te 'di
442b6(mdo sde): skad ces smras so//'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad ston cig dang /des bdag la mngon sum du 'gyur ro//de nas dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung
442b7(mdo sde): bas khyim bdag de'i bsam pa shes nas yang dag par rab tu bstan te/rigs kyi bu nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o//des na lci ba gsar bsres pa'i//
443a1(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya//sems can kun dang thun mong du//'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin dang //gang dag
443a2(mdo sde): ma 'ongs da ltar byung //byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang //rang sangs rgyas dag gang yod pa//de dag rnams la yongs su bsngo//
443a3(mdo sde): de nas dkyil 'khor khor yug dgu//'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bya ste//'jig rten dbang dang byams pa dang //thub pa skyes mchog
443a4(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang //kun tu bzang po blo ldan dang //gsadra ba pa yi ba dag po dang //'jam dpral gau zhon nur gyur pa dang //sgrib pa thams
443a5(mdo sde): cad rnam spel dang //de bzhin sa yI snying po ste//de dag gi ched du dkyil 'khor brgyad bya'o//khyim badrug 'dri ni dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya
443a6(mdo sde): bya'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin te/'di ni bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba po sam gyis mi khyab pa de las mngon sum du
443a7(mdo sde): thos so//khyim bdag gzhan yang nyon cig/kun nas skal pa mthun pa yi//'khor rnams gang zhig 'dod pa des//dkyil 'khor brgyad
443b1(mdo sde): ni 'dri bar bya//gang zhig brgya byin nyid du ni//tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bdag po dang //lha mi rgyal po'i rgyal srid dang //blo ldan sna tshogs gzugs bzang 'dod//rgyug
443b2(mdo sde): tu dkyil 'khor mchog brgyud bya//seng ge'i rgyal po bkod pa 'di ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe dge slong rnam par rgyal ba'i byung ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yinapa
443b3(mdo sde): snyam du 'dzin na de ltar mi blta ste/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong rnam par rgyal ba 'byung ba zhes bya bar gyur to//seng ge'i
443b4(mdo sde): rgyal po bkod pa de'i tshe de'i dus ni khyim bdag drag shul can gyis byin pa zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du so mo nyi'am yid gnyis zo na de ltar mi blta ste/nga
443b5(mdo sde): nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na drag shul can gyis byin pa zhes bya ba'i khyim bdag tu gyur to//ngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i bar dang /sangs
443b6(mdo sde): rgyas nyid thob kyi bar du tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum de drung dro dag tu chos 'od kun tu bsten to//bsgoms so//mang du byas so//rigs kyi bu gang gis na nga'i
443b7(mdo sde): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa 'di 'dra bar gyur pa'i rgyu ni de yin no//rkyen ni de yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems
